name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google CEO defends 'integrity' of products ahead of testimony
article: WASHINGTON The chief executive officer of Alphabet Inc's  Google on Monday defended the integrity of the company's products a day ahead of a congressional hearing where he is expected to face tough questions from U.S. lawmakers.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Waymo unveils self-driving taxi service in Arizona for paying customers
article: CHANDLER  Ariz. Alphabet's  Waymo on Wednesday launched a significant development in its costly  decade-long quest for autonomous transportation: self-driving taxis that actually generate fares. | Video

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet's Wing drone delivery business to take flight in Finland
article: Google parent Alphabet Inc's drone delivery business Wing will launch its first European delivery service in Finland in the spring of 2019  it said in a statement on Tuesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google CEO hearing in U.S. House likely to be postponed: Goodlatte
article: WASHINGTON The U.S. House Judiciary Committee will likely put off until next week a hearing with Google Chief Executive Sundar Pichai on the Alphabet Inc  unit’s social media practices because of the state funeral of former President George H.W. Bush  Chairman Bob Goodlatte said on Sunday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Does Google harm local search rivals? EU antitrust regulators ask
article: BRUSSELS EU antitrust regulators have asked Google's rivals if the internet search giant unfairly demotes local search competitors  according to a questionnaire seen by Reuters  a move which could lead to a fourth case against the Alphabet  unit.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: U.S. House panel sets Google CEO hearing for December 5
article: WASHINGTON The U.S. House Judiciary Committee will hold a hearing with Google Chief Executive Sundar Pichai on the Alphabet Inc unit's social media practices on Dec. 5  the committee said on Wednesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: YouTube shifts to make new exclusive shows  movies free to users
article: SAN FRANCISCO  Nov 27 YouTube plans to make all of its future original programming available to users for free with advertising  as the video streaming unit of Alphabet Inc's Google seeks a bigger audience for shows and movies that had mostly been restricted to its paid subscribers.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet unit halts glucose-detecting contact lens project
article: Alphabet Inc's life sciences division Verily said on Friday that it was putting on hold one of its oldest and highest-profile projects  a smart contact lens designed to help monitor sugar levels.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google hears protesters  changes sexual harassment policies
article: Nov 8 Alphabet Inc's Google said on Thursday it would make changes to how it handles sexual harassment claims  a week after thousands of its employees around the world walked off their jobs to protest its response to such issues.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Trump would consider regulating social media but urges caution
article: WASHINGTON U.S. President Donald Trump said he would consider working with Democrats to regulate social media companies  after he and other conservatives accused companies such as Twitter Inc  Facebook Inc and Alphabet Inc's Google of allegedly stifling right wing views.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google's top U.S. public policy official leaving post
article: WASHINGTON  Nov 2 Alphabet Inc's Google unit said on Friday that its Washington office chief  who also heads Americas policy  is stepping down as the company faces criticism on issues including how it protects users' privacy and its investment plans in China.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Waymo gets California OK to test driverless vehicles without backup driver
article: WASHINGTON  Oct 30 Alphabet Inc's Waymo unit on Tuesday became the first company to receive a permit from the state of California to test driverless vehicles without a backup driver in the front seat  the state's Department of Motor Vehicles said.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet misses Wall Street revenue estimates; shares fall
article: Google parent Alphabet Inc  on Thursday missed analysts' quarterly revenue estimates for the first time in at least two years and reported continuing erosion of its operating margin  sending shares down almost 7 percent after hours. | Video

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Aptoide wins court battle against Google in landmark case
article: LISBON Portuguese app store Aptoide said on Monday that a local court had ruled against Alphabet Inc's Google  in a landmark case  ordering the U.S. giant to stop removing its app from users' mobile phones without their knowledge.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google to charge Android partners up to $40 per device for apps: source
article: (This Oct. 19 story has been refiled to fix wording in fourth paragraph)

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google to charge Android partners up to $40 per device for apps - source
article: BRUSSELS/SAN FRANCISCO  Oct 19 Alphabet Inc's Google will charge hardware firms up to $40 per device to use its apps under a new licensing system to replace one that the European Union this year deemed anti-competitive  a person familiar with the matter said on Friday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google to charge smartphone makers for Google Play in Europe
article: BRUSSELS  Oct 16 U.S. tech giant Google will charge smartphone makers a licensing fee for using its popular Google Play app store and also allow them to use rival versions of its Android mobile operating system to comply with an EU antitrust order.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google tells U.S. lawmakers it is mulling options on China services
article: WASHINGTON Alphabet Inc's  Google unit has told U.S. lawmakers it was considering "a variety of options" to offer additional services in China  but declined to detail plans for addressing Chinese censorship.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet to shut Google+ social site after user data exposed
article: (This version of the October 8 story corrects to "consulting and accounting firm" from "legal firm" in paragraph 8) | Video

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google drops out of bidding for $10 billion Pentagon data deal
article: SAN FRANCISCO Alphabet Inc's Google said on Monday it was no longer vying for a $10 billion cloud computing contract with the U.S. Defense Department  in part because the company's new ethical guidelines do not align with the project  without elaborating.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google to allow certain cryptocurrency ads in U.S.  Japan
article: Alphabet Inc's  Google said on Tuesday it would allow certain regulated cryptocurrency exchanges to advertise in the United States and Japan  easing an earlier ban on all cryptocurrency ads.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Tech index refresh could give under-the-radar names their day in the sun
article: NEW YORK A reshuffling of Wall Street benchmark industry sectors that transferred high-flying FANG stocks like Facebook Inc  and Google-parent Alphabet Inc  out of the technology label may be a boon to some under-the-radar companies that used to compete with them for investor attention.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: U.S. lawmakers ask Google if it will rejoin Chinese market
article: WASHINGTON  Sept 13 A bipartisan group of U.S. lawmakers on Thursday asked Alphabet Inc's Google if it will reenter the Chinese search engine market and if it would comply with China's internet censorship policies upon its return.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Republican senator asks FTC to examine Google ads
article: SAN FRANCISCO/WASHINGTON U.S. Senator Orrin Hatch on Thursday asked the Federal Trade Commission to rekindle an antitrust investigation of Alphabet Inc's Google  and President Donald Trump vowed to fight what he called political censorship by social media companies.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Trump renews attack against technology companies
article: WASHINGTON  Aug 29 U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday renewed his attacks on technology companies and platforms  including Twitter Inc  Facebook Inc and Alphabet Inc's Google  saying they were "trying to silence" people and suggesting  without evidence  that their activities may be illegal.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Waymo sets up subsidiary in Shanghai as Google plans China push
article: BEIJING/SHANGHAI Alphabet Inc's  self-driving unit Waymo has set up a subsidiary in Shanghai  according to a business registration filing  the latest sign that the U.S. internet giant is attempting to make new inroads into China.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet to invest $375 million in health insurer Oscar Health
article: Alphabet Inc  plans to invest $375 million in Oscar Health  helping it expand to more markets and business segments  including Medicare Advantage in 2020  the health insurance start-up said on Tuesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: S&P reaches highest level since February as Alphabet shares soar
article: NEW YORK The S&P 500 on Tuesday closed at its highest level since Feb. 1 as Alphabet's blowout results bolstered expectations of a robust earnings season. | Video

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: REFILE-Alphabet trounces profit estimates on ad sales surge
article: July 23 Alphabet Inc beat Wall Street estimates for second quarter profit on Monday as it benefited from soaring sales of online advertisements  sending shares 6 percent higher in trading after the bell.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: U.S. tech enforcer says will read 'closely' EU statement on Google
article: WASHINGTON The head of the U.S. Federal Trade Commission  which has investigated Alphabet's Google in the past for abuse of web dominance  said on Wednesday he would take a close look at Europe's recent decision to fine the company 4.34 billion euros ($5 billion).

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet's GV leads $16 million investment in site rental firm Peerspace
article: SAN FRANCISCO Alphabet Inc's venture capital unit GV led a $16 million investment this month in Peerspace Inc  a self-serve online booking tool for event spaces  the firms told Reuters on Tuesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Moment of truth for Google as record EU antitrust fine looms
article: BRUSSELS Google  is set to face a record-busting EU antitrust fine this week over its Android mobile operating system but rivals hoping that an order to halt unfair business practices will help them may be disappointed.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet to make Loon  Wing projects independent companies
article: Google parent Alphabet Inc's X research division said on Wednesday its Wing and Loon projects will become independent companies.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Uber  Alphabet invest in bike sharing service Lime
article: Bike sharing service Lime said on Monday it raised $335 million from a group of investors including ride-sharing firm Uber Technologies Inc and Alphabet Inc . | Video

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: California lawmakers approve data-privacy bill opposed by Silicon Valley
article: SAN FRANCISCO  June 28 California state lawmakers on Thursday unanimously passed a data privacy bill aimed at giving consumers more control over how companies collect and manage their personal information  a bill that Google parent Alphabet Inc and other big companies have opposed.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: U.S. lawmakers want Google to reconsider links to China's Huawei
article: WASHINGTON Some Republican and Democratic U.S. lawmakers asked Alphabet Inc's  Google on Wednesday to reconsider its work with Chinese telecommunications firm Huawei Technologies Co Ltd  which they described as a security threat.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: UPDATE 1-U.S. lawmakers want Google to reconsider links to China's Huawei
article: WASHINGTON  June 20 Some Republican and Democratic U.S. lawmakers asked Alphabet Inc's Google on Wednesday to reconsider its work with Chinese telecommunications firm Huawei Technologies Co Ltd  which they described as a security threat.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Chinese truckers demonstrate over high fuel costs  truck-hailing app Manbang
article: SHANGHAI/BEIJING  June 12 Chinese truck drivers are demonstrating against higher fuel costs and the dominance of local truck hire platform Manbang which they said is squeezing incomes  a potential headache for the firm backed by SoftBank Group Corp and Alphabet Inc.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google bars uses of its artificial intelligence tech in weapons
article: SAN FRANCISCO  June 7 Google will not allow its artificial intelligence software to be used in weapons or unreasonable surveillance efforts  the Alphabet Inc unit said Thursday in standards for its business decisions in the nascent field.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: UPDATE 1-Alphabet shareholders reject diversity proposal backed by employees
article: MOUNTAIN VIEW  Calif.  June 6 Alphabet Inc's shareholders  including top executives  voted down several proposals on Wednesday  defeating campaigns to tie pay to diversity goals and to get the Google parent to provide more data about efforts to moderate user-generated content.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: RPT-FOCUS-Google's 'Reserve' tool winning converts  taking search to next level
article: SAN FRANCISCO  June 1 Alphabet Inc's Google is drawing thousands of new customers to gyms and salons each month through an appointment-booking tool released last year  Reuters has learned  a quiet step in the company's transition to the next generation of search.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google launches second app in China  woos top smartphone market
article: BEIJING Alphabet Inc's  Google has launched a file managing tool in several Chinese app stores as it looks for fresh inroads into the world's biggest smartphone market  where most of the internet giant's top products remain banned.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Yelp seeks to revive EU antitrust complaint against Google
article: SAN FRANCISCO Yelp Inc said on Tuesday it has renewed a European antitrust complaint against Alphabet Inc's Google  seeking to gain traction on a longstanding accusation that the search giant unfairly promotes its own services in results.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Highlights: Hedge funds chomped on FAANGs during first quarter tech turmoil
article: The following are some hot stocks including the so-called FAANG technology stocks - Facebook Inc   Amazon.com   Apple Inc   Netflix Inc  and Google parent Alphabet Inc  - as well as other companies in which hedge fund managers either took new stakes  adding to or exiting existing positions in the first quarter  filings with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission showed on Tuesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: BRIEF-Tiger Global Dissolves Stake In Alphabet  Takes Stake in Twitter
article: * REPORTS SHARE STAKE OF 200 000 CLASS A SHARES IN DROPBOX - SEC FILING

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Tesla executive Schwall joins Alphabet's Waymo
article: Alphabet Inc's self-driving unit  Waymo  said on Sunday that Matthew Schwall had joined the company from Tesla Inc where he was the electric carmaker's main technical contact with U.S. safety investigators.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet  Intel  FedEx  AT&T among drone pilot winners: universities
article: WASHINGTON The Federal Aviation Administration on Wednesday is unveiling 10 pilot projects from counties  cities  states and universities that have been selected to help speed the use of unmanned aerial vehicles  or drones including many major corporate partners.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: UPDATE 1-White House to hold artificial intelligence meeting with companies
article: WASHINGTON  May 8 The White House will convene a meeting on Thursday on the future of artificial intelligence in U.S. industry with major companies including Facebook Inc   Amazon.com Inc  Google parent Alphabet Inc and Oracle Corp as well as senior government officials.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet's Sergey Brin says company must assume greater responsibility
article: SAN FRANCISCO Alphabet Inc  President Sergey Brin said on Friday  that technology companies must take greater responsibility for the social impact of their work  his first comments following a year of heightened global awareness about misuse of digital services.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google-owner Alphabet's shares fall on rise in costs
article: Shares of Google parent Alphabet Inc lost more than 5 percent on Tuesday as a surge in costs drove what analysts said was its biggest ever contraction in gross margins  overshadowing strong first-quarter ad sales.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: BRIEF-Alphabet CFO Says Sites TAC To Continue To Increase As Percentage Of Sites Revenue  But Pace Of Y/Y Increase To Slow Starting Q2
article: * ALPHABET CFO - AT WAYMO  ACHIEVED 5 MILLION MILES OF DRIVING ON CITY STREETS  ADDING THE LATEST MILLION IN JUST 3 MONTHS - CONF CALL

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: ZTE may lose Android software license under U.S. order: source
article: SAN FRANCISCO China's ZTE Corp  may not be able to use Google's Android operating system in its mobile devices because of a U.S. Commerce Department export control order  a source familiar with the matter said on Tuesday  adding that ZTE and the Alphabet Inc   unit have been discussing the impact of the order.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google poised to emerge unscathed from European antitrust crackdown
article: BRUSSELS/SAN FRANCISCO The European Union's top antitrust regulator  Margrethe Vestager  has made it her mission to stem alleged anti-competitive abuses by big American tech companies  threatening as recently as last month to break up Alphabet Inc's Google.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google in talks to buy Nokia's airplane broadband business - Bloomberg
article: April 10 Alphabet Inc's Google is in talks to buy Nokia Oyj's airplane broadband business  Bloomberg reported https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2018-04-10/google-is-said-in-talks-to-buy-nokia-s-airborne-broadband-system on Tuesday  citing people familiar with the matter.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet unit to start Toronto smart-city tech pilot in summer  build in 2020
article: TORONTO Alphabet Inc's urban innovation company Sidewalk Labs hopes to break ground on its first ever smart-city project in Toronto in 2020  and begin testing some of the proposed technologies this summer  its chief executive told Reuters.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Investors not giving Alphabet enough credit for growth outlook: Barron's
article: NEW YORK Investors are not giving Alphabet Inc  sufficient credit for its growth outlook and franchise value  as the tech company could see profits expand 15 to 20 percent annually over the next three years  Barron's said in an article on Sunday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: BRIEF-Alphabet Says To Transition Network Rev Metrics To Pct Change In Impressions & Cost-Per Impression In Q1
article: * IN Q1  TO TRANSITION NETWORK REV METRICS FROM PCT CHANGE IN PAID CLICKS & COST-PER-CLICK TO PCT CHANGE IN IMPRESSIONS & COST-PER IMPRESSION

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google to acquire GIF platform Tenor
article: Alphabet Inc's Google said on Tuesday it would acquire GIF platform Tenor to help enhance search and sharing of animated images.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Facebook CEO among those invited to testify at U.S. Senate hearing
article: WASHINGTON The U.S. Senate Judiciary Committee said on Monday it had invited the chief executive officers of Facebook Inc   Alphabet Inc  and Twitter Inc  to testify at an April 10 hearing on data privacy.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google to ban ads on cryptocurrencies  related products
article: March 14 Alphabet Inc's Google said on Wednesday it will ban advertisements for cryptocurrencies and related content starting in June.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: YouTube to display Wikipedia blurbs alongside conspiracy videos
article: SAN FRANCISCO YouTube will begin displaying text from Wikipedia articles and other websites alongside some videos in a couple of weeks as the unit of Alphabet Inc's  Google attempts to combat hoaxes and conspiracy theories on the service  its chief executive said on Tuesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google Maps lets businesses promote themselves as women-led
article: SAN FRANCISCO Businesses can now describe themselves in Google Maps listings as being owned  led or founded by women  the Alphabet Inc  unit announced Wednesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google's shopping rivals call for action from EU antitrust watchdog
article: BRUSSELS Google competitors have called for further action by European Union antitrust regulators to ensure the Alphabet-owned  firm treats rivals offering shopping services equally.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: UPDATE 8-Waymo accepts $245 mln and Uber's 'regret' to settle self-driving car dispute
article: SAN FRANCISCO  Feb 9 Uber Technologies Inc will pay $245 million worth of its own shares to Alphabet Inc's Waymo self-driving vehicle unit to settle a legal dispute over trade secrets  allowing Uber's chief executive to move past one of the company's most bruising public controversies.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Uber rejected $500 million settlement with Waymo earlier this week
article: SAN FRANCISCO Alphabet Inc's Waymo early this week proposed a settlement deal with Uber Technologies Inc [UBER.UL] in which Uber would pay $500 million in equity to resolve a high-stakes trade-secrets case  but Uber directors rejected the offer in a board meeting on Tuesday  according to two sources close to the discussions.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet shifts thermostat maker Nest into Google
article: SAN FRANCISCO Alphabet Inc merged smart thermostat maker Nest  which had operated as an independent unit  into its Google hardware group  the company announced in a blog post on Wednesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet names former Time Warner Cable exec to lead internet unit
article: SAN FRANCISCO  Feb 6 Alphabet Inc said a former Time Warner Cable chief operating officer started Tuesday as chief executive of its internet service company  marking the unit's third CEO in less than two years.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet's earnings miss profit estimates as spending grows
article: Google parent Alphabet Inc missed quarterly profit forecasts as steady ad sales growth was offset by increased spending to promote its consumer gadgets  YouTube video app and cloud computing services  the U.S. technology company said on Thursday. | Video

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet  Aramco in talks to build tech hub in Saudi Arabia: WSJ
article: Google parent Alphabet Inc is in talks with Saudi state oil company Saudi Aramco about jointly building a technology hub in Saudi Arabia  the Wall Street Journal reported  citing people familiar with the matter.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google aims to get 'diverse perspectives' into search results
article: SAN FRANCISCO Alphabet Inc's Google will put more of a premium on "diverse perspectives" in its search results  saying in a blog post on Tuesday that answers highlighted at the top of result pages would soon display multiple viewpoints on topics for the first time ever.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google rolls out new addition to 'Mute This Ad' feature
article: Alphabet Inc's Google rolled out a new addition to its ads settings that will enable users to mute reminder ads in apps and on websites that partner with the company to show the ads.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: CORRECTED-Alphabet unveils Chronicle  a new cyber security business incubated at X
article: SAN FRANCISCO  Jan 24 Alphabet Inc on Wednesday unveiled Chronicle  a cyber security business founded in its X incubation unit in early 2016 that is focusing focus on developing digital "immune systems" for customers.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google  Temasek coming in as new investors in Indonesia's Go-Jek -sources
article: SINGAPORE  Jan 18 Alphabet Inc's Google   Singapore state investor Temasek Holdings Pte Ltd and Chinese online platform Meituan-Dianping are investing in a fundraising round of Indonesian ride-hailing start-up Go-Jek  sources familiar with the matter said.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google to expand cloud infrastructure with new regions  submarine cables
article: Alphabet Inc's Google said on Tuesday it would add five regions and build three new submarine cables as it expands its infrastructure for cloud customers.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google to relaunch map service in China -Nikkei
article: Jan 15 Alphabet Inc's Google will relaunch its map service in China after an eight-year absence  Nikkei reported on Monday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google removes gaming apps with pop-up porn malware
article: Alphabet Inc's  Google said on Friday it took down 60 gaming applications after security firm Check Point said it had discovered new malicious software in the apps available to both children and adults at Google Play Store.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet healthcare company gets funding to help Medicaid patients
article: Jan 4 Cityblock Health  a healthcare company which aims to serve low-income urban residents covered by Medicaid and Medicare  said on Thursday it received $20.8 million in a first round of funding from Maverick Ventures  Thrive Capital and Sidewalk Labs  the subsidiary of Alphabet Inc that founded Cityblock.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet's Google explores sale of restaurant reviewer Zagat: sources
article: Alphabet Inc's Google is exploring a potential sale of Zagat  the U.S. restaurant review guide which the search giant bought for $151 million in 2011  people familiar with the matter said.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: BRIEF-Alphabet Board Member John Hennessy Is A Likely Candidate To Replace Schmidt As Chairman- CNBC‍​
article: * SCHMIDT TRANSITION HAS BEEN IN THE WORKS FOR ABOUT A YEAR & BOARD MEMBER JOHN HENNESSY IS A LIKELY CANDIDATE TO REPLACE SCHMIDT - CNBC  CITING SOURCE ‍​ Further company coverage: ( Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com )

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet's Eric Schmidt to step down as executive chairman
article: Dec 21 Alphabet Inc said on Thursday its Executive Chairman Eric Schmidt will step down from his position to become a technical advisor as of its next regular board meeting in January 2018.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google launching artificial intelligence research center in China
article: BEIJING Alphabet Inc's  Google said on Wednesday it is opening an artificial intelligence (AI) research center in China to target the country's local talent  even as the U.S. search firm's products remain blocked in the country.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google unveils new Android software in India to power cheap smartphones
article: MUMBAI Alphabet Inc's  Google launched a stripped-down version of its Android software in India on Tuesday  as it attempts to woo millions of basic phone users in the fast-growing wireless services market.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Australia to probe Facebook  Google over media disruption
article: SYDNEY Australia's competition regulator said on Monday it would investigate whether U.S. online giants Facebook  and Alphabet Inc's  Google have disrupted the news media market to the detriment of publishers and consumers.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google launches app to for mobile phone users in emerging markets
article: SAN FRANCISCO Alphabet Inc's Google introduced an app on Wednesday designed to help Android smartphone users stay under the limits of pricey mobile data packages in developing countries.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: REFILE-UPDATE 4-Uber-Waymo trial delayed as U.S. judge raises prospect of 'cover-up'
article: SAN FRANCISCO  Nov 28 Uber Technologies Inc withheld evidence in a lawsuit filed by Alphabet Inc's Waymo  a U.S. judge said on Tuesday  delaying a trial to give Waymo time to review a letter alleging Uber trained employees to steal trade secrets and hide their tracks.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google adds 'finance' tab to search filters  revamps Google Finance
article: Alphabet Inc said on Tuesday users doing a Google search would now be able to filter results with a new "finance" tab  which works in the same way that its "images" or "news" tab does.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google buys plot near Apple's planned Danish data center
article: COPENHAGEN Alphabet Inc's Google said it has bought a plot of land in southern Denmark adjacent to a planned Apple Inc data center to make sure it has the option of building one there too.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: BRIEF-Tiger Global dissolves share stake in Alphabet  ups stake in Facebook
article: * Tiger Global dissolves share stake in Alphabet Inc - SEC filing

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet's Waymo to launch robotaxis with no human in driver's seat
article: SAN FRANCISCO Alphabet Inc's Waymo will launch a ride-hailing service with no human behind the steering wheel and has been testing the fully self-driving cars on public roads in Arizona  Chief Executive John Krafcik said on Tuesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google ditched autopilot driving feature after test user napped behind wheel
article: ATWATER  Calif. Alphabet Inc's  self-driving car unit stopped developing features that required drivers to take control in dangerous situations  its chief executive said Monday  as autopilot reliance left users prone to distractions and ill-prepared to maneuver.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet's mobile ad revenue surges; shares jump
article: (In paragraph 22  corrects Other Bets segment losses to millions of dollars  not billions in October 26 story.) | Video

headline: BRIEF-Alphabet posts qtrly earnings per share of $9.57
article: * Q3 earnings per share view $8.33 -- Thomson Reuters I/B/E/S

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet balloon project to provide limited internet in Puerto Rico
article: Experimental communications balloons provided by Alphabet Inc in collaboration with AT&T Inc will allow some of the carrier's customers in storm-ravaged Puerto Rico to send texts and access critical information on the internet  Alphabet said on Friday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: UPDATE 4-Alphabet's CapitalG leads Lyft's $1 bln funding round
article: Oct 19 Lyft Inc has raised $1 billion in fresh financing  the ride-services company said on Thursday  in a round led by one of Alphabet Inc's investment funds  further complicating the convoluted world of ride-hailing alliances and dealing a blow to rival Uber Technologies Inc.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet to develop high-tech waterfront site in Toronto
article: TORONTO Canada has tapped Google parent Alphabet Inc to help plan a mixed-use development along Toronto's Lake Ontario waterfront using cutting-edge digital technologies and urban design.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet launches U.S. ad campaign to promote driverless car safety
article: WASHINGTON Alphabet Inc's self-driving car unit Waymo and several groups are launching a campaign aimed at convincing skeptical Americans of what they say is the value and safety of driverless cars  as Congress considers how it will regulate the technology.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google to use balloons to provide Puerto Rico cell service
article: WASHINGTON  Oct 6 The U.S. Federal Communications Commission said late on Friday it had approved Alphabet Inc's application to provide emergency cellular service to Puerto Rico through its Project Loon balloons.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Social media executives to testify Nov. 1 about Russia and U.S. election
article: WASHINGTON Executives from Facebook Inc   Twitter Inc  and Alphabet Inc's  Google have been asked to testify about Russian meddling in the 2016 U.S. election before a House of Representatives panel on Nov. 1  a congressional aide said on Thursday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: U.S. lawmakers ask Facebook  Twitter for information on anti-fracking ads
article: WASHINGTON A U.S. House committee investigating whether Russia has tried to influence U.S. public opinion on fossil fuels asked Facebook   Twitter  and Alphabet  on Wednesday to turn over information about Russian entities that may have bought anti-fracking advertisements.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Waymo seeking $2.6 bln from Uber for one trade secret - lawyer
article: SAN FRANCISCO Alphabet Inc's Waymo unit is seeking about $2.6 billion from Uber for the alleged theft of one of several trade secrets in a lawsuit over self-driving cars  a lawyer for Uber said on Wednesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet talks with Lyft about possible investment: source
article: SAN FRANCISCO Alphabet Inc  is in discussions with Lyft Inc about a possible investment in the ride-hailing company  potentially deepening an existing partnership between the two firms  a person familiar with the talks said on Thursday. | Video

headline: BRIEF-Alphabet Inc to consider Lyft investment of about $1 bln - Bloomberg
article: * Alphabet Inc to consider Lyft investment of about $1 billion - Bloomberg Source text : https://bloom.bg/2vWw6RZ Further company coverage:

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Uber's bid to move Waymo court fight to arbitration denied by appeals court
article: Uber Technology Inc's attempt to move its high-profile trade secrets dispute with Alphabet Inc's self-driving car unit Waymo to private arbitration was denied again by a U.S. federal appeals court on Wednesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet's Google acts to comply with EU antitrust order
article: BRUSSELS Google  has submitted details of how it plans to stop favoring its shopping service to comply with a European Union  antitrust order  EU regulators said on Tuesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: BUZZ-BlackRock's largest mutual fund appears to warm to Google again
article: ** BlackRock Inc portfolio managers appear to have turned more optimistic on Alphabet Inc

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google fires employee behind anti-diversity memo
article: Aug 7 Alphabet Inc's Google has fired an employee who wrote an internal memo that ascribed gender inequality in the technology industry to biological differences.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Omega's Cooperman tells CNBC his biggest position is Alphabet
article: NEW YORK Hedge fund investor Leon Cooperman  the chief executive of Omega Advisors  told cable television network CNBC on Monday that his firm's biggest position was a bullish bet on Google parent Alphabet Inc.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google hopes to train 10 million people in Africa in online skills: CEO

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Former Google life sciences unit renames itself Verily
article: CHICAGO Alphabet Inc's life sciences unit  which was previously a part of the tech company's Google X research and development unit  has picked Verily as its new name as it seeks more visibility in the fast-growing medical technology sector.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: BRIEF-Eolus to build new wind farm to supply Googles Finnish data center
article: * Eolus to build new wind farm that will supply Googles Finnish data center with renewable electricity

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Ryanair to sue Google in Irish court over 'misleading adverts'
article: Ryanair has launched legal proceedings against Google and online travel agent eDreams  in the Irish High Court over what it says are misleading adverts for Ryanair flights  the airline said on Tuesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Delaware magistrate rules for Google in Collarity patent suit
article: A federal magistrate judge has invalidated as abstract a search technology patent held by web services company Collarity  which had sued Google for infringement.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google aims for China launch of Google Play app store next year: sources
article: BEIJING/HONG KONG Google  part of Alphabet Inc   aims to launch the China version of its Google Play smartphone app store next year  according to people familiar with the matter  its first major foray in the market since ending localized product support in 2010.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google names VMware co-founder Diane Greene to lead cloud push
article: Google Inc  a unit of Alphabet Inc  said it appointed VMware Inc co-founder and industry veteran Diane Greene to run its cloud business  as CEO Sundar Pichai pushes ahead with efforts to gain share in the fast-growing market.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google to contest Russia's antitrust ruling on Android
article: MOSCOW Google  will contest in court a ruling by Russia's antitrust agency that it broke competition law by abusing its dominant position with its Android mobile platform  the U.S. technology company said on Tuesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Russia's Yandex says complained to EU over Google's Android
article: MOSCOW Russia's biggest search site Yandex said on Friday it had asked the European Commission to investigate Google's practices in relation to its Android mobile operating system in the European Union.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google defeats most claims in browser tracking lawsuit
article: A U.S. appeals court upheld the dismissal of federal claims and revived two California state law claims accusing Google of invading computer users' privacy by enabling the placement of "cookies" in their browsers to track their Internet use.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google gets more time to comply with Russian anti-monopoly ruling
article: MOSCOW Google said on Monday that Russia's anti-monopoly watchdog had granted its request to extend a Nov. 18 deadline for the company to comply with a ruling to amend its contracts with smartphone producers.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: EU's Vestager says all options open in Google case
article: European Union regulators are keeping their options open as to whether to sanction Google for abusing its market power or settle the long-running case with the company  Europe's chief competition regulator said on Wednesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Flipkart hires Google executive to head consumer experience
article: Flipkart  India's biggest online marketplace  said it hired Google executive Surojit Chatterjee to head consumer experience across desktop and mobile.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: UPDATE 1-Google aims to begin drone package deliveries in 2017
article: WASHINGTON  Nov 2 Internet giant Alphabet Inc   the new holding company for Google  expects to begin delivering packages to consumers via drones sometime in 2017  the executive in charge of Google's drone effort said on Monday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google sued by express delivery driver seeking wages
article: SAN FRANCISCO  Oct 30 A driver for Google's  same day delivery service filed a proposed class action lawsuit against the company on Friday  alleging it improperly classified her as an independent contractor and owes expenses.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet  Indonesian companies to expand Web access via balloons
article: MOUNTAIN VIEW  Calif. Alphabet Inc   the new holding company for Google  has teamed up with three Indonesian telecommunications companies to expand Internet access in that country using solar-powered balloons.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Barry Diller's IAC extends partnership with Google
article: Media mogul Barry Diller's IAC/InterActiveCorp said it has extend its partnership with Alphabet Inc's Google through March 2020.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet set to open at record high; mobile ads drive revenue
article: Oct 23 New revenue streams such as mobile and video advertising should continue to propel earnings of Google parent Alphabet Inc  whose shares were set to open at a record high on Friday following better-than-expected results  analysts said.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet  formerly Google  sets share buyback  shares jump
article: SAN FRANCISCO Alphabet Inc  known until recently as Google Inc  introduced its first share buyback and beat Wall Street's profit forecast on Thursday  sending its stock to its highest-ever level in after-hours trading.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Yahoo signs ad pact with Google; earnings and revenue miss
article: Yahoo Inc  said on Tuesday it had signed a search advertising deal with Google Inc  providing a potential boost to Marissa Mayer's efforts to turn around the company  which also reported revenue and profit that fell short of market estimates. | Video

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Deutsche Telekom to file antitrust complaint against Google: NYT
article: Deutsche Telekom AG is expected to file an antitrust complaint with European competition authorities against Google Inc  the New York Times reported on Monday  citing people with direct knowledge of the discussions.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google book-scanning project legal  says U.S. appeals court
article: NEW YORK A U.S. appeals court ruled on Friday that Google's massive effort to scan millions of books for an online library does not violate copyright law  rejecting claims from a group of authors that the project illegally deprives them of revenue.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Twitter poaches Google executive Kordestani for chairman post
article: BENGALURU/SAN FRANCISCO Twitter Inc  lured Google Inc executive Omid Kordestani to become the social media company's executive chairman  the latest step in the company's turnaround efforts under Jack Dorsey  who last week was named permanent CEO.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google says Docs  Drive disruption resolved
article: Some of Google Inc's services  including Drive and Docs  which were facing disruptions for a few hours on Friday have been resolved  the company said.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Alphabet launches code for fast loading of heavy mobile content
article: Alphabet Inc  formerly Google Inc  announced a new open source code that allows faster loading of Web pages with heavy content such as video  animation and graphics on smartphones and tablets.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Russia says Google must correct contracts with mobile manufacturers by November 18
article: MOSCOW Russia's anti-monopoly agency said on Monday that Google Inc had until Nov. 18 to address charges that it was abusing its market position in the country.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Bye bye Google  hello Alphabet
article: After U.S. markets closed on Friday  Alphabet replaced Google as the publicly traded company that will house Google's search and Web advertising businesses  maps  YouTube and its "moonshot" ventures such as driverless cars.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: MOVES-Two Sigma names Google's Spector as chief technology officer
article: Oct 1 Hedge fund Two Sigma hired Google Inc's  Alfred Spector as chief technology officer and head of its engineering unit  effective immediately.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Hillary Clinton aides worried about private email use in 2011
article: NEW YORK/WASHINGTON A hacking attack on Google's Gmail service in 2011 prompted Hillary Clinton and her aides to worry about the security of private email accounts widely used by government officials who found their "antiquated" government-issued laptops inefficient.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google unveils latest Nexus phones  tablet
article: Google Inc  unveiled its new Nexus phones on Tuesday in its latest attempt to take a bite out of Apple's dominant share of the smartphone market.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google faces renewed U.S. antitrust scrutiny  this time over Android
article: WASHINGTON The U.S. Federal Trade Commission has opened a preliminary investigation into whether Google Inc  uses its Android operating system to dominate competitors as more consumers go mobile  two sources familiar with the matter said on Friday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Exclusive: Shopify  Google boosting presence in BlackBerry's hometown
article: TORONTO Tech giants such as Google Inc  and upstarts like Shopify Inc   are rapidly expanding their presence in and around BlackBerry's  hometown of Waterloo  Ontario  even as the smartphone maker further pares back some of its teams.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google does not intend to become a carmaker: executive
article: FRANKFURT Google Inc.  does not intend to become a vehicle manufacturer  the company's managing director for Germany  Austria and Switzerland said on Tuesday at the Frankfurt auto show.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Russian watchdog says Google violating competition law
article: MOSCOW Russia's anti-monopoly agency said on Monday Google Inc was abusing its market position in the country and would face penalties  in a case launched by local competitor Yandex .

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google pushes into mobile payment with Android Pay launch in U.S.
article: Google Inc said it would roll out Android Pay  a one-touch payment app on Android devices  in more than 1 million locations in the United States on Thursday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: RPT - INSIGHT-Automakers  Google take different roads to automated cars
article: DETROIT  Sept 4 From his laboratory at Pittsburgh's Carnegie Mellon University  automated vehicle pioneer Raj Rajkumar says self-driving cars will evolve step-by-step  with humans staying in charge for a long time to come.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google redesigns iconic logo for the fifth time
article: Google Inc unveiled a redesign of its iconic logo on Tuesday  the fifth such modification since the search engine giant started in 1998  the company said in a blog post.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google  Sanofi team up to improve diabetes care
article: Google Inc and French drugmaker Sanofi SA said they will partner to develop tools to improve the management and treatment of diabetes.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Russia's MTS teams up with Google to promote mobile Internet
article: MOSCOW Russia's biggest mobile phone operator MTS said on Friday it had teamed up with Google Inc to help grow the use of mobile Internet and will get a share of the search site's advertising revenues in Russia.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google rejects 'unfounded' EU antitrust charges of market abuse
article: BRUSSELS Google Inc has rejected EU antitrust charges that it abused its market power  exposing the company to the risk of a hefty fine if it does not alter its business practices.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Daimler CEO mulls JVs with Apple  Google: magazine
article: BERLIN Daimler's  chief executive said "different types" of cooperation with Apple  and Google  are possible as carmakers realize next-generation autos cannot be built without greater input from telecoms and software experts.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google launches Wi-Fi router for home use
article: Google Inc  launched a Wi-Fi router on Tuesday  the latest move in the company's efforts to get ready for the connected home and draw more users to its services.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: In Google limelight  XYZ CEO rules out sale
article: Daniel Negari could not be clearer - his company is not for sale.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: COLUMN-Why Google - and Larry Page - created their own Alphabet
article: Aug 13 With the launch of its new holding company  Alphabet  Google is trying its hardest not to be Microsoft. And Chief Executive Officer Larry Page is signaling that he does not want to be Bill Gates.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: New Google CEO Pichai made ascent with low-key style and technical chops
article: SAN FRANCISCO A low-key style and an unusually firm handle on diplomacy propelled new Google chief executive Sundar Pichai to the top of the search engine giant  former colleagues said  cementing his successes such as creating the Chrome browser.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google morphs into Alphabet Inc  investors cheer clarity
article: SAN FRANCISCO Google Inc  announced a major shake-up of its operating structure on Monday  creating a holding company called Alphabet which will contain subsidiaries to separate its core web advertising business from newer ventures like driverless cars. | Video

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google  Samsung to issue monthly Android security fixes
article: LAS VEGAS Google Inc and Samsung Electronics Co will release monthly security fixes for Android phones  a growing target for hackers  after the disclosure of a bug designed to attack the world's most popular mobile operating system.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: UPDATE 2-Apple denies plan to sell mobile services directly to consumers
article: * Mobile network service could undermine telecom operators   (Adds context  details on Google network project  share action)

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google refuses French order to apply 'right to be forgotten' globally
article: (This version of the July 30th corrects story to read "partly" of a political nature  not "mostly" in  paragraph 10)

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: No end in sight for Oracle  Google legal fight over Android
article: SAN FRANCISCO Oracle Corp's long-running legal battle with Google Inc over Google's Android operating system for smartphones and other devices probably will not proceed to another trial until the middle of 2016  a U.S. judge said on Thursday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Yelp needs help  and buyout may be the answer
article: Selling itself could be one of the few options left for Yelp Inc   which is struggling to win advertising dollars in an increasingly crowded market that already includes Google Inc   TripAdvisor Inc  and GrubHub Inc .

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Oracle seeks permission to update copyright lawsuit against Google
article: Oracle Corp has asked a U.S. judge for permission to update its copyright lawsuit against Google Inc  to include the Android operating system's current market dominance.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: LG Electronics shares surge on speculation of Google stake buy
article: SEOUL Shares of South Korea's LG Electronics Inc  surged in morning trade on Wednesday  rising as much as 14.5 percent at one point on market speculation that Google Inc  will acquire a stake in the consumer electronics maker.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: RPT-Wall St Week Ahead-Investors hope tech giants repeat Google surge
article: NEW YORK  July 17 Google Inc's strong quarterly results  which unleashed a massive surge in its shares on Friday  has investors feeling upbeat heading into next week's tech-heavy slate of earnings reports.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Investors hope tech giants repeat Google surge
article: NEW YORK Google Inc's strong quarterly results  which unleashed a massive surge in its shares on Friday  has investors feeling upbeat heading into next week's tech-heavy slate of earnings reports.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: GLOBAL MARKETS-Nasdaq ends at record; earnings  energy hit other indexes
article: * Spot gold hits five-year low   (Updates to close of U.S. markets)

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google's Porat emphasizes cost control in first comments to investors
article: SAN FRANCISCO In her much-awaited first remarks to investors on Thursday  Google Inc finance chief Ruth Porat stressed keeping expenses under control  which helped send the company's stock to record highs in after-hours trading.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: UPDATE 1-Google begins testing self-driving prototype cars in Austin  Texas
article: DETROIT  July 7 Google Inc has begun testing its self-driving cars in Austin  Texas  expanding efforts to gather information on how the prototypes interact with traffic  road conditions and people  the company said early Tuesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: UPDATE 1-Capital controls mean Greeks can click  but not buy
article: * Many online suppliers handle payment from single European centre

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Two rival self-driving cars have close call in California
article: MOUNTAIN VIEW  Calif. (This June 25  2015 story was changed to show attribution in the last sentence to the companies  instead of the California Department of Motor Vehicles and the companies)

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Delphi says self-driving car didn't come close to Google's car
article: Delphi Automotive PLC  on Friday offered a new description of an encounter on a California road between one of its prototype self-driving cars and a self-driving vehicle operated by Google Inc   saying "the vehicles didn't even come close to each other."

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google starts road tests of new self-driving car prototypes
article: SAN FRANCISCO Google Inc  said on Thursday it had started testing the latest prototypes of its self-driving cars on Mountain View  California roads  with safety drivers aboard.

name: Alphabet Inc

article: NEW YORK Google Genomics  the cloud-based computing business that is racing to increase its share of online DNA analytics  on Wednesday began offering a cloud service version of the popular DNA analysis software from the Broad Institute  a biomedical research organization.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google to remove Confederate flag from Google Shopping  ads
article: SAN FRANCISCO Google Inc said on Tuesday it would remove content containing the Confederate flag from its Google Shopping service and ads in the wake of last week's racially motivated mass shooting at a historic black church in South Carolina.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: U.S. Supreme Court rejects Google patent appeal over Street View
article: WASHINGTON Google Inc will have to defend claims that its Street View mapping software violates patents held by Vederi LLC after the U.S. Supreme Court on Monday declined to take up the company's appeal.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Critics due to get EU's Google antitrust charge sheet this week: sources
article: BRUSSELS Microsoft  German publisher Axel Springer and 17 other critics of Google are expected to get a copy of the EU's antitrust charge sheet against the search engine giant this week in order to allow them to provide feedback  four people familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Mobli takes on Internet giants with event-based photo and video search
article: TEL AVIV Israeli start-up Mobli Media Inc is taking on Internet giants Google  Facebook and Yahoo with an innovative online search tool to find the latest photos and videos across social media  the company said on Monday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: UPDATE 1-Google launches a YouTube built for gamers
article: June 12 Google Inc said on Friday that it is launching a live streaming gaming service called "YouTube Gaming"  creating a rival to Amazon.com Inc's Twitch service.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Exclusive: BlackBerry may put Android system on new device: sources
article: TORONTO BlackBerry  is considering equipping an upcoming smartphone with Google Inc.'s  Android software for the first time  an acknowledgement that its revamped line of devices has failed to win mass appeal  according to four sources familiar with the matter.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Audi CEO's privacy appeal takes aim at Google's car push
article: BERLIN  June 9 Volkswagen's Audi will take a stringent line on guarding customers' data  the carmaker's chief executive said on Tuesday  in a thinly veiled swipe at new rival Google Inc..

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: BlackRock taps Google scientist to help big data push
article: BlackRock Inc  the world's largest asset manager  has hired Bill MacCartney  a former senior Google research scientist  as a managing director  joining its scientific-active equity team  a company spokesman confirmed to Reuters.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: No transaction fee for Google on mobile phone payments -WSJ
article: June 6 Google's new mobile phone payment service  Android Pay  will not garner any transaction fees from credit card companies  which may put pressure on competitor Apple to drop or lower its charges  the Wall Street Journal reported.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google to release monthly data on self-driving car accidents
article: June 5 Google Inc said it would give monthly updates of accidents involving its driverless cars as public interest groups ask for more data on the safety of the project.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Three Google directors survive challenge over pay
article: Three Google Inc  compensation committee members were re-elected on Wednesday  the technology company said at its annual meeting  despite a challenge from a high-profile proxy adviser that raised concerns over executive pay.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Privacy app maker files EU antitrust complaint against Google
article: U.S. tech firm Disconnect has filed a complaint to EU antitrust regulators against Google's ban on its privacy app  accusing the Silicon Valley giant of abusing its dominant market position.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google says 21 percent of tech hires in 2014 were women
article: Google Inc said 21 percent of tech hires last year were women  boosting overall number of women in technical roles by 1 percent  as part of efforts to increase diversity.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Airbus Group starts $150 mln venture fund  Silicon Valley base
article: PARIS  May 29 Airbus Group announced the creation of a $150 million venture capital fund and said it had hired a Google executive to run a new centre in Silicon Valley as it seeks to wave a digital wand over its heavy-manufacturing culture.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: US STOCKS-Wall St inches down on Greece  China worries
article: * Indexes down: Dow 0.2 pct  S&P 0.1 pct  Nasdaq 0.2 pct   (Updates to close)

headline: Obama administration asks U.S. top court to decline Google copyright appeal
article: WASHINGTON/SAN FRANCISCO The Obama administration on Tuesday sided against Google Inc and said the U.S. Supreme Court should not hear the company's appeal in a case against Oracle Corp with wide implications for the technology industry  according to a court filing.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Russia warns Google  Twitter and Facebook on law violations
article: MOSCOW/FRANKFURT Russia's media watchdog has written to Google  Twitter and Facebook warning them against violating Russian Internet laws and a spokesman said on Thursday they risk being blocked if they do not comply with the rules.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: YouTube may show 'Innocence of Muslims' film: U.S. court
article: SAN FRANCISCO Google Inc should not have to remove an anti-Islamic film from its YouTube website because a woman complained that she was duped into performing in the film that depicted the Prophet Mohammed as a pedophile  a U.S. appeals court ruled on Monday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: MEDIA-Google to launch buy buttons on search-results pages in coming weeks - WSJ
article: -- Note: Reuters has not verified this story and does not vouch for its accuracy   (Editing by Frances Kerry)

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google's self-driving cars to hit roads  with steering wheels
article: DETROIT Google Inc will begin testing self-driving cars of its own design on public roads this summer  but they will have steering wheels and brakes  which is not what the company described a year ago. | Video

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: EU to review behaviour of web giants in digital market overhaul
article: BRUSSELS  May 6 The European Commission will conduct a comprehensive review this year of the role of web giants such as Google  Facebook and Amazon  to decide whether it should regulate them more tightly  it said on Wednesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Microsoft opens door to Android  Apple phone apps
article: SAN FRANCISCO Microsoft Corp  is making it easier for apps written for rival Google Inc's  Android and Apple Inc's  iOS systems to work on Windows phones  in a bid to attract users to its unpopular mobile devices  the company's operating systems chief said on Wednesday.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: BRIEF-Solocal and Google to develop joint B2B offer
article: * Strategic partnership with Google includes development of joint B2B offer and organization of series of events in France to present this solution to enterprises

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google launches portal to buy patents
article: Google Inc  said it would launch an experimental portal that allows interested patent holders to sell their patents to the company.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google executive killed in Mount Everest avalanche after quake
article: Dan Fredinburg  a Google Inc executive based in California  was among those killed on Saturday in an avalanche on Mount Everest caused by a devastating earthquake in Nepal  the company said.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google shares rise after online ad sales drive revenue higher
article: Google Inc reported higher quarterly revenue and  profit as rising online ad volume offset a hit from the strong dollar  sending the Internet company's shares higher in after-hours trading.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: UPDATE 2-Google rolls out new U.S. wireless service
article: NEW YORK  April 22 Google Inc on Wednesday launched a new U.S. wireless service that switches between Wi-Fi and cellular networks to curb data use and keep phone bills low.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google lobbying spending reached new high in early 2015
article: WASHINGTON Google Inc   already one of Washington's biggest spenders  set a company record for its lobbying activity in the first quarter of 2015 when it spent $5.5 million  according to a government database.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: UPDATE 2-EU to charge Russia's Gazprom with market abuse - sources
article: * Vestager acts despite political ramifications-analyst   (Adds Gazprom source  expert comments)

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: EU to investigate transparency of Internet search results: document
article: BRUSSELS Internet platforms such as Google  Microsoft and Yahoo! will be the subject of a widespread inquiry by European regulators to determine whether they are transparent enough in how they display search results.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: EU accuses Google of hurting consumers  competitors in Web search case
article: BRUSSELS The European Union accused Google Inc on Wednesday of cheating consumers and competitors by distorting Web search results to favor its own shopping service  after a five-year investigation that could change the rules for business online. | Video

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Android co-founder Andy Rubin's new company raises $48 million
article: The company started by Andy Rubin  the architect of Google Inc's Android mobile business  to support and advice device-making tech startups has raised $48 million in equity financing  according to a regulatory filing.

name: Alphabet Inc

article: April 3 Plaintiffs in an antitrust lawsuit against Google Inc on Friday withdrew their case accusing the search engine company of harming smartphone buyers by forcing handset makers using Android operating system to make Google's own applications the default option.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Mozilla to also reject Chinese Internet body's certificates
article: BEIJING Mozilla Corp  creator of the popular Firefox web browser  said on Thursday it would follow Google Inc and no longer recognize new certificates of trust issued by a Chinese Internet agency.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google fails to dismiss privacy lawsuit over Google Wallet
article: A federal judge has rejected Google Inc's  request to dismiss a lawsuit accusing the technology company of invading the privacy of users of its Google Wallet electronic payment service by sharing their personal information with outside app developers.

headline: Google to pay CFO Porat more than $70 million
article: (This March 26th story has been corrected to remove 'in the next two years' from headline and first paragraph)

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: UPDATE 2-Google to pay CFO Porat more than $70 mln in 2 years
article: March 26 Google Inc said it would pay its new Chief Financial Officer  Ruth Porat  more than $70 million in the next two years through a combination of restricted stock units and a biennial grant.

name: Alphabet Inc

article: WASHINGTON Three U.S. Federal Trade Commission members said on Wednesday they regretted the inadvertent release of part of an agency report about its probe of Google Inc  as the company continues to face antitrust scrutiny from European authorities.

name: Alphabet Inc

article: * Indexes off: Dow 0.58 pct  S&P 0.61 pct  Nasdaq 0.32 pct   (Updates to market close)

article: While a highly contentious copyright dispute between Oracle Corp and Google Inc gets most of the attention  the battle over patents between the tech heavyweights continues as a U.S. appeals court on Friday resurrected part of an Oracle patent that had been successfully invalidated by Google.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Obama to promote U.S. jobs  investment to international executives
article: WASHINGTON President Barack Obama will promote U.S. business investment programs to executives from Google Inc  BMW AG and other international companies on March 23 at an administration-led summit to boost job creation in the United States.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google to open first UK 'garage' to fix small firms' web problems
article: LEEDS  England Google on Friday launched its first "digital garage"  a multi-million pound project it said would help 200 000 small British businesses harness the Internet to grow.

name: Alphabet Inc

article: MUMBAI Two Indian firms could get a boost from tech majors in what might turn out to be the first direct investment in the country by Google Inc and Alibaba.

name: Alphabet Inc

article: March 11 Google Inc introduced a cloud storage service for users to store "cold data" and access it much faster than traditional services.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: UPDATE 2-Google CFO retiring  leaves spreadsheets for backpack
article: March 10 Google Inc's  finance chief said on Tuesday that he plans to retire  the latest in a series of changes in the company's upper ranks but a move that some analysts said was unlikely to cause major disruptions.

name: Alphabet Inc

article: NEW YORK The U.S. Senate on Monday confirmed former Google Inc executive Michelle Lee to head the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office  a position that has been vacant for more than two years.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Silicon Valley debate on self-driving cars: do you need a map?
article: SAN FRANCISCO The Silicon Valley race to build a self-driving car may revolve around one simple question: to map or not to map.

name: Alphabet Inc

article: BOSTON Apple Inc and Google Inc said on Tuesday that they have developed fixes to mitigate the newly uncovered 'Freak' security flaw affecting mobile devices and Mac computers.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Beset by regulation  Google merges European divisions: source
article: Google Inc has combined its two European regional divisions as it seeks to meet the challenges of tougher regulation across the continent  a source close to the company said on Thursday.

name: Alphabet Inc

article: Google Inc  is combining its two European arms to meet the challenges of a more combative regulatory landscape on the continent  the Financial Times said.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google partners with wireless carriers to push Wallet service
article: SAN FRANCISCO Google Inc has partnered with several large U.S. wireless carriers to pre-install its electronic payment service on phones  as the companies seek to counter Apple Inc's recent entry into the nascent market for mobile payments.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google wins dismissal of U.S. lawsuit over Android app limits
article: A federal judge on Friday dismissed a lawsuit accusing Google Inc of harming smartphone buyers by forcing handset makers that use its Android operating system to make the search engine company's own applications the default option.

headline: UPDATE 1-YouTube to launch paid music service in a few months
article: Feb 18 Google Inc's YouTube is set to launch its long-awaited paid monthly subscription service called YouTube Music Key in a few months  said Robert Kyncl  the online video service's head of content and business operations  at the Code/Media conference.

name: Alphabet Inc

article: Feb 18 Google Inc is set to launch a subscription model for YouTube in a few months  CNBC quoted Robert Kyncl  the online video service's head of content and business operations as saying at the Code/Media conference.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Bosch CEO: Tech industry interlopers force car industry to react

name: Alphabet Inc

article: NEW YORK  June 24 Consumer watchdog Public Citizen has called on U.S. regulators to conduct a review of Google Inc's recent acquisition of aerospace startup Skybox Imaging  concerned that Skybox's satellite technology may aid manipulation of commodity markets.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Google's Nest to buy Dropcam for $555 million: report
article: Google Inc's Nest Labs will buy home-monitoring camera startup Dropcam for about $555 million in cash  technology blog Re/code reported on Friday  taking another step deeper into consumers' homes.

name: Alphabet Inc

article: Google Inc is considering an investment in a new cable across the Pacific Ocean  the Wall Street Journal reported citing people familiar with the matter.

name: Alphabet Inc

article: Gemalto NV  the French digital security company  said on Friday that the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit rejected its patent claim relating to the Android smart phone operating platform.

name: Alphabet Inc
headline: Judge says concerned about Apple  Google hiring settlement
article: SAN JOSE Calif. A U.S. judge on Thursday said she had concerns about approving a $324.5 million settlement involving Apple  Google and two other tech companies in a lawsuit accusing them of conspiring to avoid poaching each other's workers.

name: Alphabet Inc

name: Amazoncom Inc
headline: Amazon starts selling fashion  sportswear in Brazil
article: SAO PAULO Amazon.com Inc  said on Wednesday it will start selling sportswear and clothing on its Brazilian site  bolstering the list of products that third party vendors offer on its local   e-commerce marketplace.

name: Amazoncom Inc
headline: Is Amazon liable for selling defective products? Three appeals courts will decide
article: In September 2016  William Foley took a drag on his vaping device and nearly burned down his house in La Miranda  California. Foley’s home insurer  State Farm  paid Foley more than $400 000 for repairs and related expenses. The insurer contends the fire was caused by a defective LG battery in Foley’s vaping device. Last month  State Farm lawyers at Pillemer & Pillemer filed a complaint in Los Angeles Superior Court  seeking to recoup the money it paid on Foley’s claim.

name: Amazoncom Inc
headline: Exclusive: Amazon considering UK insurance comparison site - sources
article: LONDON Amazon.com Inc  is sounding out some of Europe's top insurance firms to see if they would contribute products to a UK price comparison website in what would be a major foray by the U.S. online retail giant into the region's financial services.

name: Amazoncom Inc
headline: Amazon to open Colombia service center  employ 600 workers
article: BOGOTA Amazon.com Inc  on Tuesday said it will open its first customer service center in Colombia in October and employ 600 people.    The center  intended to prevent and resolve problems  will serve customers worldwide in Spanish  English and Portuguese  the world's largest online retailer said in a statement.

name: Amazoncom Inc
headline: Amazon  Google win Fed Circuit decision nixing Uniloc antipiracy patent
article: A group of digital content providers including Amazon.com Inc and Alphabet Corp's Google on Thursday won an appeals court decision invalidating a patent asserted against them by licensing company Uniloc USA Inc.

name: Amazoncom Inc
headline: Indian regulator clears Walmart's $16 billion acquisition of Flipkart
article: NEW DELHI India's anti-trust regulator has approved U.S. retail giant Walmart Inc's  $16 billion acquisition of online marketplace Flipkart  beefing up the competition to Amazon.com Inc  in the fast growing e-commerce market.

name: Amazoncom Inc
headline: Amazon and Microsoft nudge S&P 500 closer to record high
article: The S&P 500 inched nearer to a record high on Tuesday  lifted by Amazon  Alphabet and Microsoft  and by a strong second-quarter earnings season that fueled optimism about the U.S. economy's strength. | Video

name: Amazoncom Inc

article: ROME Italy's communications regulator AGCOM said on Thursday it had fined Amazon a total of 300 000 euros ($348 360) for offering postal services without proper authorization.

article: WASHINGTON Amazon.com Inc  and other retail and logistics companies said on Wednesday they had started a new group to lobby to keep the U.S. Postal Service's (USPS) package delivery services "reliable and affordable."

article: Amazon.com Inc  T-Mobile US Inc and Cox Media Group Inc have asked a federal judge in California to toss a lawsuit accusing hundreds of companies of discriminating against older workers by targeting only younger people in Facebook job ads  calling it "unwieldy and improper."

article: March 29 Australian shares are likely to open flat on Thursday  after a see-saw session on Wall Street in which online retailer Amazon.com          led the major U.S. stock indexes lower.        The local share price index futures          rose 0.1 percent or 7 points to 5 772  a 17.5-point discount to the underlying S&P/ASX 200 index         close. The benchmark dropped 0.7 percent on Wednesday.     New Zealand's benchmark S&P/NZX 50 index         fell 0.1 percent or 5.22 points

headline: Breakingviews - Amazon HQ2 choices disappointingly undisruptive
article: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - Amazon has disrupted great swaths of the U.S. retailing landscape  but it’s choosing not to break the mold with its second headquarters. The e-commerce giant has cut the field of candidates to 20 prime locations to complement its Seattle base  including Dallas  Atlanta and New York. Hundreds of cities hoped Amazon would think outside the box  but a desire for talent and a welcoming environment led it to the usual hot spots.

The risk is that its stock will too.
