name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple tops $800 billion market cap for first time
article: NEW YORK Apple Inc  became the first U.S. company to top the $800 billion mark in market capitalization on Tuesday  slightly more than two years after it crossed the $700 billion threshold.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Court kills off Affinity Labs patent asserted against Apple
article: A federal appeals court on Friday upheld a ruling that invalidated a patent owned by Affinity Labs of Texas LLC  a serial plaintiff in patent infringement cases against Apple Inc  AT&T Inc  Amazon.com Inc and other tech companies.

name: Apple Inc
headline: S&P 500 tech index edges toward $5 trillion while Apple steals spotlight
article: NEW YORK/SAN FRANCISCO While some investors have been waiting for Apple's market capitalization to reach $1 trillion  those looking for big round numbers might be better off looking to the S&P 500 technology index as a whole  which is approaching the $5 trillion mark.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple to create $1 bln U.S. advanced manufacturing fund  CEO says
article: SAN FRANCISCO  May 3 Apple Inc Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook said the iPhone maker plans to create a $1 billion fund to invest in advanced manufacturing companies in the United States.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple plays soothing iPhone hold music
article: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - Apple is playing some soothing iPhone hold music. The tech colossus sold nearly 51 million smartphones despite maturing markets and a resurgent Samsung following its exploding-battery crisis. App-store sales also grew nicely  and more dividends and buybacks are on the way. That should pacify investors until Apple rolls out the 10th anniversary edition of its pioneering device.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple  tech lift Wall Street as Nasdaq sets record
article: Wall Street climbed on Monday  boosted by gains in Apple and other big tech stocks that more than offset weak economic data and pushed the Nasdaq Composite to another record high. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple  Tesla ask California to change proposed self-driving car test policy
article: Apple Inc  urged California to toughen up its proposed policy on testing self-driving cars  a move that would result in more public data that could help Apple catch up to rivals in the self-driving space by giving it a better window into their strengths and weaknesses.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Qualcomm warns of profit hit as Apple battle intensifies
article: Qualcomm Inc slashed its current-quarter profit and revenue forecasts on Friday  amid an escalating legal battle between the chipmaker and Apple Inc .

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple in talks to launch money-transfer service: Recode
article: Apple Inc  has held talks with payments industry partners about launching a money-transfer service  technology news website Recode reported on Thursday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: BRIEF-Apple plans to launch new educational sessions in all Apple stores
article: * Says plans to launch new educational sessions next month in all 495 Apple stores Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

name: Apple Inc
headline: Austrian chip maker AMS may raise mid-term revenue growth target
article: Austria's AMS   which supplies Apple  and Samsung  with chips  may increase its mid-term revenue growth target as it expects significant ramp-ups in its consumer business in the second half of the year.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple self-driving car testing plan gives clues to tech program
article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc outlined a plan to train operators of self-driving cars in documents submitted to California regulators earlier this month  the latest clues to the company's autonomous vehicle technology aspirations.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Acacia escalates Apple patent fight with new infringement claims
article: Apple Inc is facing a new patent infringement lawsuit by Acacia Research Corp  a licensing firm Apple has previously accused of conspiring with Nokia Corp to extract exorbitant patent royalties from smartphone makers.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Qualcomm results beat help allay worries over Apple dispute
article: Qualcomm Inc   the largest maker of chips used in smartphones  reported quarterly revenue and profit that beat analysts' estimates  helping ease concerns surrounding the company's dispute with Apple Inc .

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple settles Unwired Planet patent case on eve of trial
article: Apple Inc said on Monday it had settled a patent infringement case brought by the licensing firm Unwired Planet just before trial was set to begin.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Federal Circuit upholds verdict for Apple in Conversant patent case
article: A federal appeals court on Friday upheld a jury verdict for Apple Inc in a patent infringement case brought by the Canadian licensing firm Conversant Intellectual Property Management Inc.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple receives permit in California to test self-driving cars: DMV
article: Apple Inc  has secured a permit to test autonomous vehicles in California  fuelling speculation that it is working on self-driving car technology in a crowded arena of companies hoping to offer those cars to the masses. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: UPDATE 2-TSMC's Q1 profits hurt by strong Taiwan dollar; cautions trend to stay
article: * Q1 profit down from record Q4  strong domestic currency hurts

name: Apple Inc
headline: BRIEF-Apple has a secret team of biomedical engineers working on treating diabetes - CNBC
article: * Has a secret team of biomedical engineers working on treating diabetes - CNBC

name: Apple Inc
headline: Qualcomm hits back at Apple's lawsuit  accuses iPhone maker of false statements
article: Qualcomm Inc hit back at Apple Inc's charges that were made in a U.S. lawsuit in January  saying the iPhone maker breached agreements with the firm and encouraged regulatory attacks on its business in various jurisdictions around the world by making false statements.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Australian regulator sues Apple alleging iPhone 'bricking'
article: SYDNEY Australia's consumer watchdog has sued Apple Inc  alleging it used a software update to disable iPhones which had cracked screens fixed by third parties. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Analysis: Apple aims for more control  less cost as it accelerates in chip design
article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc's decision to stop licensing graphics chips from Imagination Technologies Group Plc is the clearest example yet of the iPhone maker's determination to take greater control of the core technologies in its products - both to guard its hefty margins and to position it for future innovations  especially in so-called augmented reality.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Imagination Technologies' shares plunge 70 percent after Apple ditches firm
article: LONDON Imagination Technologies  has been told by Apple   its biggest customer  that the maker of iPhones  iPads and Apple Watches is to stop using its graphics technology in its new products  sending shares in the company crashing by more than 70 percent on Monday. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple  Amazon  Google join bidding for Toshiba chip unit: media
article: TOKYO Apple Inc   Amazon.com Inc  and Google have joined bidding for Toshiba's  NAND flash memory unit  vying with others for the Japanese firm's prized semiconductor operation  the Yomiuri Shimbun daily reported on Saturday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple sends warning to banks with Australian mobile payments decision
article: SYDNEY Apple Inc on Friday won a victory in its global fight to prevent banks from introducing their own mobile payment services on Apple devices  as an Australian regulator barred lenders from bargaining collectively for access. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: REFILE-Australia to bar banks from bargaining collectively with Apple over payments
article: SYDNEY  March 31 Australia's competition regulator on Friday said it would bar a group of the country's largest banks from bargaining collectively for access to Apple Inc's contactless payment function  potentially setting a global precedent.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Samsung launches Galaxy S8 and dreams of recovery from Note 7
article: March 29 Samsung Electronics Co Ltd unveiled its Galaxy S8 flagship smartphone as it battles to regain the market leadership it lost to Apple Inc after the embarrassing withdrawal of the fire-prone Note 7s.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Chinese court rules in favour of Apple in local design patent disputes
article: BEIJING A Chinese court has ruled in favour of Apple in design patent disputes between the Cupertino  California company and a domestic phone-maker  overturning a ban on selling iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus phones in China  Xinhua news agency reported.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Chinese court rules in favor of Apple in local design patent disputes
article: BEIJING A Chinese court has ruled in favor of Apple in design patent disputes between the Cupertino  California company and a domestic phone-maker  overturning a ban on selling iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus phones in China  Xinhua news agency reported.

name: Apple Inc
headline: LG Electronics to launch mobile payments service in South Korea in June
article: SEOUL South Korea's LG Electronics Inc said on Wednesday it will launch a new mobile payments service in its home country in June  trying to keep up with smartphone leaders Samsung Electronics Co Ltd and Apple Inc.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple drives further into Facebook  Snap territory with video app
article: SAN FRANCISCO With the release of a new video app called Clips  Apple Inc is inching one step closer to fully engaging in the messaging world  where its huge base of iPhone users could help it compete with Snap Inc's Snapchat and Facebook Inc's  Messenger.

name: Apple Inc
headline: TSMC says to decide on U.S. chip plant next year
article: TAIPEI Taiwan's TSMC  the world's largest contract chipmaker and a major Apple Inc supplier  on Monday said it would take a decision next year on whether to build a U.S. chip plant.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple says to add two more R&D centres in China
article: HONG KONG  March 17 Apple will set up two new research and development centres in Shanghai and Suzhou in China  it said in a statement in its Chinese website on Friday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple  Google  Facebook skip legal challenge to new travel ban
article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc  Alphabet Inc's  Google and Facebook Inc are among more than 60 technology companies that appear to have backed away from the legal fight against U.S. President Donald Trump's controversial travel ban  deciding not to put their weight behind a lawsuit seeking to block the second version of his executive order.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple's Siri learns Shanghainese as voice assistants race to cover languages
article: SAN FRANCISCO With the broad release of Google Assistant last week  the voice-assistant wars are in full swing  with Apple Inc   Amazon.com Inc   Microsoft Corp  and now Alphabet Inc's  Google all offering electronic assistants to take your commands.

name: Apple Inc
headline: CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-Buffett says Berkshire owns 133 mln shares of Apple -CNBC
article: NEW YORK  Feb 27 Warren Buffett  chairman and chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway Inc  told CNBC on Monday that his conglomerate had purchased "70 million plus" shares of Apple Inc in 2017 and that U.S. stocks were not in "bubble territory."

name: Apple Inc
headline: BRIEF-Abercrombie & Fitch on conf call- Q1 will remain challenging as we sort through assortment issue
article: * On conf call- in Hollister guys  had strong performance in denim  knit tops and outerwear in Q4

name: Apple Inc
headline: U.S. appeals court tosses patent verdict against Apple
article: A federal appeals court has thrown out a jury verdict that had originally required Apple Inc to pay $533 million to Smartflash LLC  a technology developer and licenser that claimed Apple's iTunes software infringed its data storage patents.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple says it spent $50 billion last year with U.S. suppliers
article: CUPERTINO  Calif. Apple  spent roughly $50 billion last year at U.S.-based suppliers including 3M  and Corning   Chief Executive Tim Cook said on Tuesday  stressing the iPhone-maker's commitment to U.S. manufacturing.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple and SAP to release tool to build business apps
article: Apple Inc and German software maker SAP SE will release a tool aimed at helping developers build iPhone apps for big businesses  the two companies said on Monday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Berkshire Hathaway gains $1.6 billion from its huge bite of Apple
article: NEW YORK Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc  is sitting on more than $1.6 billion of gains in its investment in Apple Inc.  after shares of the iPhone maker surged.

name: Apple Inc
headline: BRIEF-Apple Inc director Albert Gore Jr sells 215 437 shares of co's common stock on Feb 22
article: * Apple Inc director Albert Gore Jr reports sale of 215 437 shares of co's common stock on Feb 22 at $136.72 per share - SEC filing  Source text: (http://bit.ly/2lT6h3z) Further company coverage:

name: Apple Inc
headline: Tech breakthroughs take a backseat in upcoming Apple iPhone launch
article: SAN FRANCISCO When Apple Inc  launches its much-anticipated 10th anniversary iPhone this fall  it will offer an unwitting lesson in how much the smartphone industry it pioneered has matured. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Appeals court sides with Apple in speaker patent fight
article: A federal appeals court has invalidated crucial claims in an audio speaker patent at the heart of an infringement lawsuit against Apple Inc.

name: Apple Inc
headline: BRIEF-Verizon says Andrew Mckechnie named Chief Creative Officer of its newly formed in-house agency
article: * Says Andrew Mckechnie  formerly of Apple Inc has been named Chief Creative Officer of its newly formed in-house agency  Source text for Eikon:  Further company coverage:

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple to start India manufacturing in coming months with iPhone SE: source
article: MUMBAI Apple Inc will in the coming months start assembling its lower-priced iPhone SE models at a contract manufacturer's plant in the southern Indian technology hub of Bengaluru  an industry source with direct knowledge of the matter said on Friday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: In loss for Apple  Federal Circuit revives patent nixed by PTAB
article: A federal appeals court has breathed new life into a cloud storage technology patent that Personal Web Technologies LLC has asserted against Apple Inc  Google Inc and a number of other tech companies.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple breaks intraday record high for first time since 2015
article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc's share price hit an intraday record high on Tuesday for the first time in almost two years as investors raised bets that a 10th anniversary iPhone will boost lackluster sales.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple hits record high but leaves some investors in dust
article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple  shares cruised to a record-high close Monday  helping catapult the S&P 500 stock index over the $20 trillion mark in what amounts to a victory for plain-vanilla mutual funds over a bevy of hedge fund managers who recently backed away from the iPhone maker. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Australian banks narrow focus of Apple Pay collective bargaining request
article: SYDNEY Australian banks seeking permission from the country's competition regulator to bargain collectively with Apple Inc  over its mobile payment system said on Monday they will focus on gaining access to the U.S. tech company's contactless payment function  removing the fees Apple charges as a bone of contention.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple sows seeds for India iPhone awakening
article: HONG KONG (Reuters Breakingviews) - Apple is planting the seeds for India's iPhone awakening. The $695 billion company is nearing a deal to assemble its iconic phone in Karnataka  a southwestern state in one of the world's fastest growing handset markets. That would help lower retail prices and boost potential sales at a time when the Cupertino-based firm is losing its footing elsewhere in Asia.

name: Apple Inc
headline: BRIEF-Vanguard Group hikes passive stake in Apple to 6.3 pct from 5.8 pct
article: * Raises passive stake in Apple to 6.33 percent as of 2016-end versus 5.79 percent stake as of 2015-end  Source text: http://bit.ly/2k7Sp5p Further company coverage:

name: Apple Inc
headline: Federal Circuit punts on Apple v. Samsung retrial question
article: A federal appeals court has instructed the trial judge in Apple Inc.’s long-running patent fight with Samsung Electronics Co to decide whether a retrial on the issue of damages is necessary to address legal issues raised by the U.S. Supreme Court.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Channeling Steve Jobs  Apple seeks design perfection at new 'spaceship' campus
article: SAN FRANCISCO Inside the original Macintosh computer  Apple co-founder Steve Jobs inscribed the signatures of his team  revealing his deep concern for even the hidden features of his products. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: BRIEF-Apple files for nine-part  $10.0 bln notes offering
article: * Files for nine-part  $10.0 billion notes offering - sec filing  Source text : http://bit.ly/2jI79aU Further company coverage:

name: Apple Inc
headline: Irish calculation similar to EU on Apple tax estimate: minister
article: DUBLIN The European Commission's estimate that Apple  owes Ireland up to 13 billion euros ($14 billion) in a disputed tax ruling is unlikely to be altered greatly by Dublin's calculations  the Irish finance minister said on Thursday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: S&P 500 ends flat  Apple spike lifts Nasdaq
article: NEW YORK The S&P 500 edged higher on Wednesday to cap a four-day losing streak  buoyed by gains in Apple shares and after the Federal Reserve kept U.S. interest rates unchanged  as expected. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple working harder to squeeze iPhone juice
article: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - Apple is working harder to squeeze juice out of its iconic iPhone. The company sold more units in the holiday quarter  yet profit fell. A saturating market and slowing innovation aren't helping margins. Yet the prospect of a new phone and the ability to sell additional services are bright spots that should keep investors on board.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple shares back in vogue as Wall Street bets on iPhone surge
article: SAN FRANCISCO Wall Street has regained an appetite for Apple as investors bet that the release of a 10th-anniversary iPhone and pent up customer demand will shore up shrinking sales.

name: Apple Inc
headline: As regulators waver  Apple takes on Qualcomm in courts
article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc's new legal assault on Qualcomm in the United States and China reflects its conclusion that regulators are unlikely to put an end to what it considers the chip maker's unfair business practices  analysts said.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple sues Qualcomm in Beijing seeking 1 billion yuan
article: Apple Inc filed a lawsuit against Qualcomm Inc in Beijing  alleging the chip supplier abused its clout in the chip industry and seeking 1 billion yuan ($145.32 million) in damages  Beijing's Intellectual Property Court said in a statement on Wednesday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: U.S. trade commission to probe Nokia complaint against Apple
article: WASHINGTON The U.S. International Trade Commission said on Tuesday it will investigate a complaint by Nokia Technologies alleging that Apple Inc has imported smart phones  tablet computers and other electronics that infringe upon its patents.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Chief of Taiwan's Foxconn says rise of protectionism unavoidable
article: TAIPEI The head of Foxconn  the world's largest contract manufacturer of electronic goods and a major Apple Inc supplier  said on Sunday that the rise of protectionism is unavoidable.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple files $1 billion lawsuit against chip supplier Qualcomm
article: Apple Inc filed a $1 billion lawsuit against supplier Qualcomm Inc on Friday  days after the U.S. government accused the chip maker of resorting to anticompetitive tactics to maintain a monopoly over key semiconductors in mobile phones.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Canada's Competition Bureau reaches deal with Apple  publishers
article: OTTAWA Canada's business competition watchdog said on Friday it had reached an agreement with Apple Inc and three major e-book publishers that will allow retailers to offer discounts to customers.

name: Apple Inc
headline: EU antitrust regulators welcome Amazon  Apple audiobook deal
article: BRUSSELS/FRANKFURT A decision by Amazon and Apple to scrap all exclusivity obligations in the supply and distribution of audiobooks will likely boost competition  EU antitrust regulators said on Thursday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: After pound's fall  Apple to hike British app store prices
article: LONDON Tech giant Apple is set to raise the prices of its apps in Britain by around 25 percent after the steep drop in sterling following Britain's vote to leave the European Union.

name: Apple Inc
headline: U.S. appeals court revives antitrust lawsuit against Apple
article: SAN FRANCISCO iPhone app purchasers may sue Apple Inc over allegations that the company monopolized the market for iPhone apps by not allowing users to purchase them outside the App Store  leading to higher prices  a U.S. appeals court ruled on Thursday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Tesla taps Apple engineer for Autopilot software
article: Electric carmaker Tesla Motors Inc  has hired a key Apple Inc  software engineer to oversee its Autopilot self-driving software efforts  Tesla said in a blog post Tuesday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: China's WeChat seeks slice of Apple's app store with 'mini' function
article: BEIJING China's largest mobile social media network WeChat is offering its 768 million users a function which allows them to by-pass app stores such as Apple's .

name: Apple Inc
headline: Australia shares likely to open higher  NZ flat
article: Jan 9 Australian shares are expected to trade higher on Monday  mirroring gains on Wall Street that saw the Nasdaq and S&P500 hit record-highs on Friday  boosted by Apple Inc.     The record trading session followed a U.S. Labor Department report that showed the economy added fewer-than-expected jobs last month but wages increased  suggesting resilience in the labor market.[ nL1N1EV1GW]     The local share price index futures rose 0.2 pct to 5 730  a 25.6 point discount to the underl

name: Apple Inc
headline: US STOCKS-Boosted by Apple  Wall Street parties like it's 19 999
article: * Indexes up: Dow 0.47 pct  S&P 0.56 pct  Nasdaq 0.86 pct   (Updates to afternoon)

name: Apple Inc
headline: Factbox: Apps removed from Apple's China app store
article: Apple Inc  removed the New York Times Co's  news apps from its app store in China on Dec. 23  following a request from the Chinese authorities. An Apple spokesman said the company had been informed that the app was "in violation of local regulations".

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple confirms $1 billion investment in SoftBank tech fund
article: Apple Inc  confirmed on Wednesday its plans to invest $1 billion in a tech fund being set up by Japan's SoftBank Group Corp .

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple partner Wistron seeks to expand India smartphone parts plant: government official
article: MUMBAI Smartphone component maker Wistron Corp  which counts Apple Inc among its customers  has applied for permission to expand its plant in the Indian city of Bengaluru  a high-ranking regional government official said on Monday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple to cut iPhone production in first quarter of 2017: report
article: Apple Inc  will trim production of iPhones by about 10 percent in the January-March quarter of 2017  the Nikkei financial daily reported on Thursday  citing calculations based on data from suppliers.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Nokia files more patent suits against Apple
article: HELSINKI Finnish telecoms networks equipment maker Nokia  said on Thursday it had filed a new set of patent lawsuits against Apple Inc  in Asia  Europe and the United States. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple's new AirPods tough to recycle: report
article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc's  new wireless headphones could be a problem for recyclers  according to an electronics firm that took apart the device to review its component parts.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple appeals against EU tax ruling  Brussels says no cause for low tax bill
article: BRUSSELS Apple Inc.  appealed on Monday against a $14-billion tax demand as the European Union issued details of its ruling that the iPhone maker won sweetheart tax deals from the Irish government which amounted to illegal subsidies. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Porsche race car engineer joins Apple: source
article: FRANKFURT Apple poached the technical director of Porsche's race car program earlier this year  a company source said on Friday  hiring a project manager who helped engineer the sports car company's victorious return to the Le Mans endurance race.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple AirPod headphones available for sale after two-month delay
article: Apple Inc  said on Tuesday its wireless AirPod headphones were now available through its website  two months after the company delayed their launch for unexplained reasons.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple in talks to invest $1 billion in SoftBank tech fund: source
article: Apple Inc  has held talks to invest up to $1 billion in a new $100 billion tech fund being set up by Japan's SoftBank Group Corp   a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Monday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Foxconn says in preliminary discussions to expand U.S. operations
article: TAIPEI Foxconn  the world's largest contract electronics manufacturer and a major Apple Inc  supplier  said on Wednesday that it was in preliminary discussions to expand its operations in the United States. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple Watch sales to consumers set record in holiday week  says Apple's Cook
article: SAN FRANCISCO Sales of the Apple Watch to consumers set a record during the first week of holiday shopping  and the current quarter is on track to be the best ever for the product  Apple Inc  Chief Executive Tim Cook told Reuters. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple shows ambition to get into self-driving car race
article: WASHINGTON Apple Inc  is wading in to the debate over regulation of self-driving cars  declaring it is excited about the potential for automated transportation and calling on U.S. regulators not to restrict testing of such vehicles.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Cook ups Apple support for fight against AIDS
article: Apple Inc  is expanding its support for the fight against AIDS through the (RED) charity founded by rock singer Bono  Chief Executive Tim Cook said in an interview ahead of World Aids Day.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Australian regulator set to oppose collective bank bargaining on Apple Pay
article: SYDNEY Australia's antitrust regulator said on Tuesday it is likely to deny four local banks permission to collectively bargain with Apple Inc  in relation to its mobile digital payments system.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Australian regulator to block collective bank bargaining on Apple payment system
article: SYDNEY  Nov 29 Australia's antitrust regulator said on Tuesday it was planning to deny some banks authorisation to collectively bargain with Apple Inc in relation to its mobile digital payment system.

article: The China Consumers Association (CCA) has asked Apple  to investigate "a considerable number" of reports by users of iPhone 6 and 6s phones that the devices have been shutting off and cannot be turned back on again  it said on Tuesday.

name: Apple Inc

article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple's  stock extended recent losses on Monday after a warning that iPhone sales could suffer if President-elect Donald Trump follows through on campaign threats to impose new tariffs on China.

headline: Cirrus Logic surges as Wall Street plugs in high-tech earbuds
article: SAN FRANCISCO Shares of Apple supplier Cirrus Logic Inc surged 7.5 percent on Friday after its quarterly results beat expectations and Wall Street bet on the future adoption of fancy earbuds with high-end digital technology.

article: CUPERTINO  Calif. Apple Inc unveiled a revamped MacBook Pro on Thursday  adding a fingerprint reader  replacing function keys with a small touch screen and raising prices by several hundred dollars. | Video

article: HONG KONG Apple Inc  will set up a research and development center in China's manufacturing metropolis Shenzhen  the U.S. tech giant said on Wednesday  as the firm looks to spur growth in the world's second largest economy amid growing competition.

article: HONG KONG  Oct 12 Apple Inc will set up a research and development centre in China's manufacturing metropolis Shenzhen  the U.S. tech giant said on Wednesday  as the firm looks to spur growth in the world's second largest economy amid growing competition.

headline: Apple-Samsung iPhone patent feud leaves U.S. top court struggling

article: NEW YORK  Oct 10 U.S. stocks rose on Monday as energy shares gained with oil prices and as Apple jumped following problems with rival Samsung Electronics Co Ltd's Note 7 phone.

article: NEW YORK A federal appeals court on Friday reinstated a $120 million jury award for Apple Inc  against Samsung  marking the latest twist in the fierce patent war between the world's top smartphone manufacturers.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple shares perk up after strong report from iPhone chip supplier

article: BOSTON  March 6 Apple Inc customers were targeted by hackers over the weekend in the first campaign against Macintosh computers using a pernicious type of software known as ransomware  researchers with Palo Alto Networks Inc  told Reuters on Sunday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: U.S. tech companies unite behind Apple ahead of iPhone encryption ruling
article: Tech industry leaders including Alphabet Inc's  Google  Facebook Inc  Microsoft Corp  AT&T and more than two dozen other Internet and technology companies filed legal briefs on Thursday asking a judge to support Apple Inc in its encryption battle with the U.S. government.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple supplier Broadcom to slash 1 900 jobs globally
article: Chipmaker Broadcom Ltd  the company created following the merger of Avago and Broadcom  said it would cut about 1 900 jobs globally across its businesses.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple should not try making a car on its own  Marchionne says
article: GENEVA U.S. technology giant Apple should collaborate with carmakers to make a vehicle and use the expertise already available rather than attempt to do it on its own  Fiat Chrysler Chief Executive Sergio Marchionne said.

name: Apple Inc
headline: U.S. attorney general worried encryption debate 'all about Apple'
article: SAN FRANCISCO U.S. Attorney General Loretta Lynch said on Tuesday her Justice Department's court battle to force Apple Inc  to unlock an iPhone linked to one of the San Bernardino shooters ran the risk of becoming "all about Apple" and that the company should not be able to decide the broader encryption debate alone.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Attorney General Lynch says hopes Apple will comply with court order
article: WASHINGTON U.S. Attorney General Loretta Lynch said on Monday that she hopes Apple Inc.  will still comply with the court order by a federal judge in California to unlock the iPhone used by one of the San Bernardino shooters.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Samsung wins appeal in patent dispute with Apple
article: A U.S. appeals court on Friday overturned a $120 million jury verdict against Samsung  finally handing the South Korean smartphone maker a significant win in its longstanding patent feud with top rival Apple.

name: Apple Inc
headline: UPDATE 1-Apple CEO Tim Cook commits to annual dividend raise
article: Feb 26 Chief Executive Tim Cook said on Friday Apple Inc is committed to raising its dividend annually  a move designed to please investors but also a sign the world's most famous technology company may no longer be a growth stock.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple calls FBI iPhone request 'unprecedented' in court filing
article: Apple Inc on Thursday struck back in court against a U.S. government demand that it unlock an encrypted iPhone belonging to one of the San Bernardino shooters  arguing such a move would violate its free speech rights and override the will of Congress.

name: Apple Inc
headline: UPDATE 1-Verizon supports 'strong encryption with no backdoors' -CEO
article: NEW YORK  Feb 24 Verizon Communications Inc  supports "the availability of strong encryption with no backdoors " Chief Executive Lowell McAdam said on Wednesday  weighing in the showdown between Apple Inc and U.S. authorities over mobile device encryption.

name: Apple Inc
headline: COLUMN-DOJ accuses Apple of 'misleading' in encryption fight: Frankel
article: NEW YORK Feb 23 In Apple's depiction of its intensifying fight with the U.S. Justice Department over accessing data from the iPhone of accused San Bernardino shooter Syed Farook  the company is heroically battling in courts across the country for the principle of protecting the privacy of cellphone users  even if that principle requires Apple to oppose government requests to help investigators crack security on suspected criminals' phones.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Exclusive: San Bernardino victims to oppose Apple on iPhone encryption
article: Some victims of the San Bernardino attack will file a legal brief in support of the U.S. government's attempt to force Apple Inc to unlock the encrypted iPhone belonging to one of the shooters  a lawyer representing the victims said on Sunday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Trump calls for boycott until Apple unlocks shooter's phone
article: PAWLEYS ISLAND  S.C. Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump called on Friday for a boycott of Apple Inc products until the tech company agreed to help the U.S. government unlock the cellphone of one of the killers in last year's San Bernardino  California  shooting.

name: Apple Inc
headline: UPDATE 3-Trump calls for boycott until Apple unlocks shooter's phone
article: PAWLEYS ISLAND  S.C.  Feb 19 Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump called on Friday for a boycott of Apple Inc products until the tech company agreed to help the U.S. government unlock the cellphone of one of the killers in last year's San Bernardino  California  shooting.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple Pay takes on China's internet kings in mobile payments
article: BEIJING Apple Inc launched its mobile payment system in China on Thursday in a bid to convince the hundreds of millions of users of the country's entrenched  dominant services to switch. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Factbox: What Apple and the U.S. government are fighting over
article: Apple Inc  is resisting a federal court order that it help the U.S. government break into the iPhone 5c of Rizwan Farook  who along with his wife killed 14 people in a December shooting in San Bernardino  California  which the government has described as a terror attack.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Icahn  Einhorn's Greenlight slash Apple stakes amid fourth-quarter share decline
article: BOSTON Several big hedge fund backers of Apple Inc   including billionaire activist investor Carl Icahn and David Einhorn's Greenlight Capital  trimmed their stakes in the fourth quarter amid a decline in the value of the iPhone maker's shares.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple to launch new iPhone  iPad in March: 9to5mac
article: Apple Inc  is on target to introduce its next iPhone and iPad models on March 15  and aims to start selling the devices in the same week  technology blog 9to5Mac reported  citing sources.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple to launch new iPhone  iPad in March - 9to5mac
article: Feb 12 Apple Inc is on target to introduce its next iPhone and iPad models on March 15  and aims to start selling the devices in the same week  technology blog 9to5Mac reported  citing sources.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Japan Display says will swing to January-March op loss as Apple orders sag
article: TOKYO  Feb 8 Japan Display Inc on Monday said it would swing to an operating loss in January-March  as client Apple Inc books slowing sales of its iPhone and while the costs of keeping up with rivals in smartphone screen technology rise.

name: Apple Inc
headline: TSMC says quake impact on first-quarter shipments no more than 1 percent
article: TAIPEI Apple Inc  supplier Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co Ltd (TSMC)  said silicon wafers were damaged at a plant in southern Taiwan where a quake hit early on Saturday  affecting no more than 1 percent of first-quarter shipments.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple fights to limit damages after $625 mln VirnetX verdict
article: Apple Inc asked a U.S. judge to declare a mistrial in its dispute with VirnetX Holding Corp on Wednesday  just hours before a federal jury ordered the iPhone maker to pay $625.6 million for infringing the patent licensor's Internet security technology.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple ordered to pay $625 mln in patent dispute with VirnetX
article: NEW YORK  Feb 3 Apple Inc must pay VirnetX Holding Corp more than $625 million for using the patent licensing company's Internet security technology without permission in its FaceTime and iMessage features  a federal jury in Texas said on Wednesday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Alphabet overtakes Apple in market value - for now
article: Alphabet Inc  might win the market cap battle against Apple Inc   but will it win the war? | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Alphabet passes Apple to become most valuable traded U.S. company
article: NEW YORK Alphabet Inc surpassed Apple Inc as the most valuable company in the United States in after-hours trading on Monday  knocking the iPhone maker from the top spot that it has held for the better part of four years.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Top U.S. official to meet EU antitrust team on tax
article: BRUSSELS - A senior U.S. Treasury official will meet European Union antitrust officials investigating tax deals involving Apple and Amazon on Friday  the latest lobbying effort against a crackdown on U.S. firms.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple to voluntarily recall some AC wall plug adaptors
article: Apple Inc said on Thursday it was voluntarily recalling AC wall plug adapters designed for use in Argentina  Australia  Brazil  Continental Europe  New Zealand and South Korea.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple shares fall most in two years in wake of earnings report
article: Apple Inc  shares fell more than 6.5 percent on Wednesday  the biggest percentage drop in two years  after the company reported its slowest-ever rise in iPhone shipments and forecast that quarterly sales for the current period would post the first drop in 13 years.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple iPhone sales weaker than expected
article: Apple Inc  sold fewer iPhones than expected in the latest quarter  seeing its slowest ever-growth in shipments  as the company began to feel the effects of economic softness in the critical Chinese market.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Taiwan stocks rise; Largan  TSMC up after Apple gains
article: TAIPEI  Jan 25 Taiwan stocks rose on Monday  paced by gains in Apple Inc's suppliers following the U.S. company's shares surged 5 percent on Wall Street on Friday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple's Zadesky  head of electric car project  to leave company: WSJ
article: Apple Inc's  Steve Zadesky  who has been overseeing the company's electric car project for the last two years  has said he is leaving the company  the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday  citing people familiar with the matter.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Fewer orders at Apple suppliers could signal first iPhone sales decline
article: TAIPEI Some of Apple Inc's main Asian suppliers expect revenues and orders to drop this quarter  indicating iPhone sales are almost certain to post their first annual decline since the flagship product was launched almost a decade ago. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple seeks nod to open India stores amid concerns of slowing sales growth
article: MUMBAI Apple Inc has applied to set up its own stores in India  one of the world's fastest growing smartphone markets  as the iPhone-maker looks to tap new opportunities amid worries of slowing growth in its main markets.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple makes progress on gender  racial diversity
article: Apple Inc has made progress on boosting gender and racial diversity in its U.S. workforce  a regulatory document filed by the iPhone maker showed.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple to start charging for iTunes Radio
article: Apple Inc said it will soon start charging for iTunes Radio  its music-streaming service that competes with Pandora Media Inc.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Growth funds dumping Apple stock as iPhone sales seen sagging; value-managers moving in
article: NEW YORK Major U.S. growth mutual funds have been among the largest sellers of Apple Inc  shares over the past six months  fueling speculation that the company’s days of supercharged growth have come to an end.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple  Samsung supplier Biel Crystal plans $2 billion HK IPO in 2016: IFR
article: HONG KONG Biel Crystal Manufactory  which supplies the cover glass for Apple Inc  Samsung Electronics Co Ltd and other mobile phone makers  plans an initial public offering worth about $2 billion in Hong Kong  IFR reported on Monday  citing people close to the plans.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple invalidates Wi-Lan wireless patent at U.S. appeals court
article: After losing a patent infringement case against Apple Inc in a lower U.S. court  Canadian wireless technology company Wi-Lan  Inc has come away on appeal with an invalid patent.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple suppliers cut revenue estimates amid iPhone shipment fears
article: Apple Inc  suppliers Cirrus Logic Inc  and Qorvo Inc  on Thursday added to growing worries about slowing shipments of iPhone 6S and 6S Plus by cutting their revenue estimates for the third quarter.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple shares drop below $100 for first time since August
article: Apple Inc  shares dropped below $100 for the first time in nearly five months on Wednesday following reports of slowing shipments of the iPhone 6S and 6S Plus.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple expected to cut iPhone 6S  6S Plus production: Nikkei
article: Apple Inc is expected to cut production of its latest iPhone models by about 30 percent in the January-March quarter  the Nikkei reported.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple shares off but weather U.S. market selloff
article: SAN FRANCISCO Shares of Apple Inc  fell to their lowest since August on Monday following recent worries about potentially soft iPhone sales but fared better than a 2 percent drop in major indexes.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple to pay Italy 318 million euros  sign tax deal: source
article: Apple Inc will pay Italy's tax office 318 million euros ($348 million) to settle a dispute over allegations it failed to pay taxes for six years  a source with direct knowledge of the matter said on Wednesday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple shares to close year with worst performance since 2008
article: NEW YORK  Dec 31 Shares of Apple Inc  the largest U.S. company by market value  are set to finish the year in the red on notable weakness for a stock that had largely been impervious to pain for several years.

name: Apple Inc
headline: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St drops on oil and Apple weakness
article: NEW YORK  Dec 30 Wall Street dropped on Wednesday as Brent crude slid towards 11-year lows and Apple weighed on the S&P 500 index  which clung to a meager gain for 2015.

name: Apple Inc
headline: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Oil  Apple pull Wall St lower
article: NEW YORK  Dec 28 Wall Street fell on Monday  hurt by a steep drop in oil prices as well as a dip in Apple shares  pushing the S&P 500 back into negative territory for 2015.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple asks court to make Samsung pay $180 million more in patent dispute
article: NEW YORK Just over a week after Samsung paid Apple more than $548 million for infringing the patents and designs of the iPhone  Apple has asked a U.S. court to force its biggest smartphone rival to cough up even more.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple asks court to make Samsung pay $180 mln more in patent dispute
article: NEW YORK Just over a week after Samsung paid Apple more than $548 million for infringing the patents and designs of the iPhone  Apple has asked a U.S. court to force its biggest smartphone rival to cough up even more.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple allows long-term shareholders to nominate board members
article: Dec 23 Apple Inc on Tuesday became the latest U.S. company to amend its bylaws to allow long-term shareholders to nominate members to its board.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Tim Cook calls notion of Apple avoiding U.S. taxes 'political crap'
article: SAN FRANCISCO/BENGALURU Apple Inc Chief Executive Tim Cook dismissed as "total political crap" the notion that the tech giant was avoiding taxes.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple supplier's light forecast exacerbates iPhone jitters
article: SAN FRANCISCO Concerns are deepening on Wall Street about potential weakness in iPhone shipments following a light revenue forecast from one of Apple's suppliers.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Appeals court maintains Apple injunction order against Samsung
article: A U.S. appeals court on Wednesday denied Samsung's request to reconsider its September decision greenlighting an injunction against the South Korean company in a patent dispute with Apple.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Samsung appeals Apple patent 'windfall' ruling to U.S. Supreme Court
article: NEW YORK Samsung took to the U.S. Supreme Court on Monday in a last-ditch effort to pare back the more than $548 million in damages it must pay Apple for infringing the patents and designs of the iPhone.

name: Apple Inc

article: NEW YORK Apple Inc won a deal with pop star Taylor Swift to exclusively release a concert video of her recent world tour through its music streaming service  Apple Music  the company and singer said on Sunday. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: AMS says surprised by report of problems with Apple supply contracts
article: ZURICH  Dec 10 Swiss-listed Austrian technology group AMS said it was surprised by a newspaper report that it had run into problems with key contracts to supply Apple   which knocked its shares down by a fifth on Thursday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple asks U.S. Supreme Court to toss e-books antitrust decision
article: NEW YORK Apple Inc has asked the U.S. Supreme Court to overturn an appellate court decision that found the iPad maker conspired with five publishers to increase e-book prices.

name: Apple Inc
headline: US STOCKS-Wall St jumps as Fed keeps Dec rate hike in play
article: * Indexes up: Dow 1.1 pct  S&P 1.2 pct  Nasdaq 1.3 pct   (Updates to close)

name: Apple Inc

article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc  painted a rosy picture for its new iPhones on Tuesday  but a sequential slowdown of overall sales in China cast doubt on the strength of its business in the world's most important market for smartphones. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: JPMorgan Chase says it is building a rival to Apple Pay
article: LAS VEGAS JPMorgan Chase & Co  said on Monday it will soon launch its own competitor to Apple Pay that will allow consumers to pay retailers using their smartphones in stores  and it has already won the endorsement of a major group of merchants.

name: Apple Inc
headline: RPT-Wall St Week Ahead-Nasdaq 100 index may see record with Apple earnings due Tuesday
article: NEW YORK  Oct 25 The Nasdaq 100 index  dominated by U.S. technology stocks  may set a record high next week  helped by good earnings from Apple Inc expected on Tuesday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Nasdaq 100 index may see record with Apple earnings due Tuesday
article: NEW YORK The Nasdaq 100  index  dominated by U.S. technology stocks  may set a record high next week  helped by good earnings from Apple Inc  expected on Tuesday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple to build more solar projects in China  green its suppliers
article: WASHINGTON/SAN FRANCISCO Apple announced Wednesday it will build 200 megawatts of solar energy projects in China and work with local suppliers to source more renewable energy  its latest moves to green its Chinese supply chain amid criticism that its local partners are heavy polluters.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple tells U.S. judge 'impossible' to unlock new iPhones
article: NEW YORK Apple Inc told a U.S. judge that accessing data stored on a locked iPhone would be "impossible" with devices using its latest operating system  but the company has the "technical ability" to help law enforcement unlock older phones.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple's auto ambitions sideswipe electric motorcycle startup
article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc's  aggressive recruitment of auto experts as it explores building a car has left a promising  if financially troubled  electric motorcycle startup in the dust.

name: Apple Inc

article: A U.S. jury on Friday ordered Apple Inc  to pay the University of Wisconsin-Madison's patent licensing arm more than $234 million in damages for incorporating its microchip technology into some of the company's iPhones and iPads without permission.

name: Apple Inc

article: JAKARTA Indonesia's president will court tech giants Apple and Google during his first trip to the United States this month  seeking investment for sustainable mining and greater internet access  a senior cabinet minister told Reuters.

name: Apple Inc

article: Oct 14 - Apple's potential damages in a patent fight with the University of Wisconsin's licensing body could reach $400 million as a trial on the amount Apple owes for infringing a processor patent got under way on Wednesday  two people familiar with the case said.

name: Apple Inc

article: NEW YORK Apple Inc could be facing up to $862 million in damages after a U.S. jury on Tuesday found the iPhone maker used technology owned by the University of Wisconsin-Madison's licensing arm without permission in chips found in many of its most popular devices.

name: Apple Inc

article: HALF MOON BAY  Calif Starbucks Corp  coffee shops will begin accepting Apple Inc's  mobile payment system in a pilot program starting this year  Apple Vice President Jennifer Bailey said on Thursday.

name: Apple Inc

article: NEW YORK Apple Inc's antitrust compliance program has improved  but the company continues to impede a court-appointed monitor overseeing the program  acting as "its own worst enemy " the monitor told a federal judge in a report made public on Tuesday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: VMware shares pare gains after report Apple not renewing licensing agreement
article: NEW YORK VMware shares sharply pared gains on Monday after CRN reported Apple will not renew an expiring VMware enterprise licensing agreement.

name: Apple Inc

article: SAN FRANCISCO Many short sellers appear to have unwound their bets against Apple this week  and a 6 percent fall in the stock price suggests they made money as investor worries about the company countered a record launch of its newest iPhone.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Carl Icahn says would 'keep cash' given market risks: CNBC
article: NEW YORK Billionaire activist investor Carl Icahn said on Wednesday he would recommend investors hold cash given market risks and that he was "seriously considering" buying "a lot more" shares of Apple Inc.

name: Apple Inc
headline: UPDATE 3-Google unveils latest Nexus phones  tablet
article: Sept 29 Google Inc unveiled its new Nexus phones on Tuesday in its latest attempt to take a bite out of Apple's dominant share of the smartphone market.

name: Apple Inc

article: Apple  said on Monday it had sold more than 13 million iPhone 6s and 6s Pluses during their first weekend of availability in 12 markets  setting a record for its marquee product. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: New pink iPhones prove popular as record weekend sales expected
article: SAN FRANCISCO/SYDNEY The iPhone 6s and 6s Plus hit stores around the world on Friday  kicking off what is expected to be a record weekend of sales as customers scrambled to buy Apple Inc's  marquee product in pink for the first time. | Video

name: Apple Inc

article: SAN FRANCISCO The new iPhone 6s and 6s Plus arrive in stores and at consumers' doorsteps on Friday  kicking off a sales cycle that will be scrutinized for signs of how much juice Apple's marquee product has left.

name: Apple Inc
headline: China's 'fake' Apple stores thrive ahead of new iPhone launch

name: Apple Inc

article: BEIJING/BOSTON A senior Apple Inc executive on Tuesday said the company would make it easier for Chinese app developers to download its tools for building mobile apps in a bid to prevent further attacks on its App Store.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple targets shipping date for electric car for 2019: WSJ
article: Apple Inc  has designated building an electric car as a "committed project" and has set a target shipping date for 2019  the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple pledges more aid to help with Europe's migrant crisis
article: Apple Inc is stepping up aid to the thousands of migrants that are streaming into Europe from war-torn countries  Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook told employees in an internal message on Friday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Damages retrial postponed as Apple appeals $532 mln Smartflash verdict
article: A federal judge in Texas on Thursday postponed a retrial on damages in a case in which Apple was ordered to pay $533 million to patent holder Smartflash LLC.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple users face issues upgrading to iOS 9: 9to5Mac
article: Apple Inc customers were facing issues while upgrading to iOS 9  which was released on Wednesday  technology blog 9to5Mac reported.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple says sales of new iPhones are off to strong start
article: Apple Inc  said on Monday that advance orders of its new iPhones were on pace to beat the 10 million units the previous versions logged in their first weekend last year  a feat that analysts attributed to the inclusion of sales from China. | Video

name: Apple Inc

article: U.S. stocks ended higher on Thursday in another day of broad swings as investors showed nervousness ahead of next week's much-anticipated Federal Reserve meeting  but gains in Apple and biotech shares supported the day's advance. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple phone  tablet and TV fail to impress investors
article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc  unveiled a new TV set top box that responds to voice commands and fresh iPhones that sense the pressure of a finger tap  changes which underwhelmed many social media commenters and investors. | Video

name: Apple Inc

article: Apple Inc will make gaming a key part of an Apple TV product it is expected to unveil at an event on Wednesday  according to a New York Times online report on Sunday.

name: Apple Inc

article: BERLIN Samsung Electronics  said on Thursday it would make its next smartwatch technology available to its competitors who also use Google Inc's  mobile platform Android  hoping to increase its share of the market  which is now dominated by Apple Inc .

name: Apple Inc
headline: LVMH hires former Apple executive as digital director
article: PARIS LVMH has hired Ian Rogers  an Apple Inc iTunes senior director  to be its new head of digital  as part of the luxury group's drive to more fully embrace the Internet.

name: Apple Inc

article: Apple Inc is looking to move into the original programing business to compete with video streaming companies such as Netflix Inc  Variety reported on Monday.

name: Apple Inc

article: Despite objections from class counsel  a federal judge in California has sent roughly $4.5 million in uncashed checks from a settlement over alleged warranty breaches involving Apple's iPhones and iPods to states as unclaimed property.

name: Apple Inc

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple may launch new iPhones at Sept. 9 event
article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc  on Thursday invited journalists to a Sept. 9 event  where it is expected to unveil new iPhones and potentially a new version of its Apple TV set-top box.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple  Samsung duke it out over $548 mln verdict payment
article: Apple and Samsung are locking horns in a federal court in California over the iPhone maker's demand that Samsung immediately cough up more than $548 million it says it is owed from a 2012 jury verdict.

article: FRANKFURT Apple Inc patents covering the "slide to unlock" feature on smartphones are invalid  Germany's highest appeals court ruled on Tuesday  reaffirming a 2013 decision rejecting the U.S. company's claims by a lower court.

article: * Indexes down: S&P 4.06 pct  Nasdaq 3.78 pct  Dow 3.97 pct   (Updates to afternoon trade  adds comment)

name: Apple Inc

article: DETROIT/SAN FRANCISCO Consumer electronics company Apple Inc  has hired a senior engineer from electric car maker Tesla Motors Inc   according to a LinkedIn posting  as part of Apple's effort to build a team of experts in automated driving.

name: Apple Inc

article: Smartphone sales in China  the world's biggest market for the devices  fell in the second quarter for the first time  market research firm Gartner Inc  said on Thursday. | Video

article: The U.S. Patent and Trademark Office has found that a patent on an iPhone design that is key to a long-running smartphone battle between Apple and Samsung should not have been granted in the first place.

name: Apple Inc

article: SYDNEY  Aug 17 (IFR) - Australia's corporate bond market is poised for a big boost as US tech giant Apple prepares its first Kangaroo bond.

article: BOSTON Top U.S. hedge funds bought new shares of Apple Inc during the second quarter or added to their existing positions  ahead of a decline in the value of shares of the iPhone maker.

article: A U.S. appeals court on Thursday denied a request by Samsung Electronics Co Ltd to reconsider its decision from May upholding a finding that the company infringed several design patents on Apple Inc's iPhone and leaving intact a more than $500 million damage award.

article: U.S. stocks rebounded in afternoon trading on Wednesday to end little changed as energy shares and Apple bounced back  offseting continued concerns about a slowdown in China.

name: Apple Inc

article: * Indexes down: Dow 1.2 pct  S&P 1 pct  Nasdaq 1.3 pct   (Updates to close)

article: MUMBAI Taiwan's Foxconn  the world's largest contract electronics manufacturer and a key supplier to Apple Inc   on Saturday signed a pact with Maharashtra to invest $5 billion over five years on a new electronics manufacturing facility.

name: Apple Inc

article: Aug 6 Apple Inc said on Thursday its new music streaming service has attracted more than 11 million members during its free trial period  a response that music industry experts called respectable but not overwhelming.

name: Apple Inc
headline: CORRECTED-Apple's momentum 'meltdown' bites investors
article: NEW YORK  Aug 4 Has the "curse of the Dow" finally caught up with Apple?

name: Apple Inc

article: Wall Street ended lower on Tuesday for a third straight session as investors worried about a rise in interest rates while Apple's shares hit their lowest in over six months. | Video

article: FRANKFURT/SAN FRANCISCO  July 31 BMW  and Apple may rekindle a courtship put on hold after an exploratory visit by executives of the world's top maker of electronic gadgets to the headquarters of the word's biggest seller of premium cars.

headline: Apple  BMW in courtship with an eye on car collaboration
article: FRANKFURT/SAN FRANCISCO BMW  and Apple  may rekindle a courtship put on hold after an exploratory visit by executives of the world's top maker of electronic gadgets to the headquarters of the word's biggest seller of premium cars.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple cannot halt Smartflash patent case  but Samsung can - appeals court

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple revenue lags Street's view despite strong China growth
article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc posted a smaller-than-expected 6 percent rise in quarterly revenue on Tuesday  but revenue surged 28 percent in greater China despite stiff competition in its third-largest market. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Fund managers unconvinced by Apple rebound as firm readies results
article: NEW YORK/SAN FRANCISCO Apple  once a can't-miss stock  is finding it tough to persuade  portfolio managers to come back into the fold.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple should do more to tackle in-app purchases problem -EU
article: BRUSSELS  July 18 Apple has provided no concrete and immediate solutions to tackle the problem of adults and children racking up credit card bills by making "in-app" purchases on tablets and mobile phones  the European Commission said on Friday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple appoints BlackRock founding partner to board
article: Apple Inc said Susan Wagner  founding partner of BlackRock Inc  had been appointed to its board.

name: Apple Inc
headline: CANADA STOCKS-China data lifts TSX to record closing high
article: * TSX up 145.02 points  or 0.96 percent  at 15 226.34     * Nine of the 10 main index sectors advance     * BlackBerry dives after IBM-Apple partnership      By John Tilak     TORONTO  July 16 Canada's main stock index climbed to a record closing high on Wednesday with bullish economic data from China helping to drive up commodity prices and natural resource shares.     Providing further support  figures from the U.S. Labor Department showed producer prices rose more than expected in

name: Apple Inc
headline: UPDATE 1-IBM to offer iPads and iPhones for business users
article: WASHINGTON  July 15 International Business Machines Corp will partner exclusively with Apple Inc  to sell iPhones and iPads loaded with applications geared at enterprise clients this fall  the company announced on Tuesday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: UPDATE 1-Apple iPhone a danger to China national security -state media
article: BEIJING  July 11 Chinese state media branded Apple Inc's iPhone a threat to national security because of the smartphone's ability to track and time-stamp user locations.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple iPhone a danger to China national security: state media
article: BEIJING Chinese state media on Friday branded Apple Inc's  iPhone a threat to national security because of the smartphone's ability to track and time-stamp user locations.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple store layout may be registered as trade mark - EU court
article: BRUSSELS  July 10 The layout of a shop  such as Apple's flagship stores may be registered as a trade mark under certain conditions  the European Court of Justice said on Thursday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Advocates for blind  deaf want more from Apple
article: SAN FRANCISCO Advocates for the blind are debating whether to use a carrot or a stick to persuade one of their oldest allies  Apple Inc  to close an emerging digital divide in mobile technology.

name: Apple Inc
headline: BUZZ- GT Advanced Technologies Inc: UBS downgrade
article: ** The sapphire glass maker's shares down 8 pct at $18.04 premarket on Monday

name: Apple Inc
headline: Samsung Electronics faces falling profits as succession looms
article: SEOUL Smartphone leader Samsung Electronics Co Ltd faces a third straight quarter of profit decline that could become a fourth as cheaper models grab a bigger share of a slowing market and Apple Inc readies the launch of its iPhone 6.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple poaches another luxury executive as iWatch nears
article: PARIS  July 4 Apple has poached a senior executive from Swiss luxury watch brand Tag Heuer  which could be to help it with the launch of its iWatch expected this autumn.

name: Apple Inc
headline: 'Disappointed' Amazon fights FTC over mobile in-app buys
article: SAN FRANCISCO Amazon.com Inc is fighting U.S. regulators' demands that it pay a penalty over its policies on purchases made by children on smartphone applications  according to documents seen by Reuters.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Tech threat a warning for fund managers to step up
article: * Changing structure of fund industry entices new entrants

name: Apple Inc
headline: AMS in talks to buy Dialog Semiconductor
article: FRANKFURT Austrian semiconductor maker AMS  is in talks to buy Germany's Dialog Semiconductor   a supplier of chips for Apple's  iPhone and iPad  the two companies said on Thursday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: UPDATE 2-Google sets sights on TVs  cars and watches  beyond mere smartphones
article: SAN FRANCISCO  June 25 Google Inc's   Android software is coming to cars  televisions and watches this year  as the Internet search giant races against Apple Inc and other tech companies to extend its business into a rapidly broadening field of Internet-connected devices.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Japan Display's reliance on iPhone orders rises in 2013-14
article: TOKYO Japan Display Inc  the world's biggest smartphone LCD maker  got a third of its revenue from Apple Inc in the year to March  growing more reliant on the iPhone even as it seeks to bump up orders from fast-growing Chinese smartphone makers.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple  Google  Samsung vie to bring health apps to wearables
article: SAN FRANCISCO For decades  medical technology firms have searched for ways to let diabetics check blood sugar easily  with scant success. Now  the world's largest mobile technology firms are getting in on the act. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple's iWatch may sport multiple designs: WSJ
article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc plans to launch smartwatches with multiple screen sizes and designs this fall  the Wall Street Journal on Friday cited a person familiar with the matter as saying.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Taiwan's Quanta to start mass production of Apple's smartwatch in July: source
article: TAIPEI Taiwan's Quanta Computer Inc 2382.TW will start mass production of Apple Inc's AAPL.O first smartwatch in July  a source familiar with the matter said  as the U.S. tech giant tries to prove it can still innovate against rival Samsung Electronics Co Ltd. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Amazon aims to break from pack with 3D  shopping-ready 'Fire' phone
article: SEATTLE Amazon.com Inc's  new cellphone seeks to offer shoppers instant gratification by recognizing thousands of products  television shows and songs and allowing users to immediately buy them - on the e-commerce giant's own site  of course.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple settles e-book antitrust case with U.S. states  others
article: Apple Inc reached an out-of-court settlement with U.S. states and other complainants in an e-book price-fixing class action lawsuit  effectively avoiding a trial in which the iPad maker faced as much as $840 million in claims.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Priceline adds OpenTable to its menu for $2.6 billion
article: Travel website owner Priceline Group Inc  will buy restaurant reservation website operator OpenTable Inc  for $2.6 billion  aiming to broaden its services outside the increasingly competitive online travel industry.

name: Apple Inc
headline: EU investigates tax rulings on Apple  Starbucks  Fiat
article: BRUSSELS/LONDON The European Commission raised pressure on Ireland  the Netherlands and Luxembourg over their corporate tax practices  saying it was investigating deals the countries have cut with Apple  Starbucks and Fiat. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Synaptics to buy iPhone display chipmaker for $475 million
article: Touchscreen chipmaker Synaptics Inc  said it would buy the sole supplier of display chips for the iPhone for $475 million  potentially winning back Apple Inc  as a customer.

name: Apple Inc
headline: US STOCKS-Futures point to dip at the open despite deals
article: * Futures down: Dow 10 pts  S&P 2.4 pts  Nasdaq 4 pts   (Adds Family Dollar news)

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple to make 3-5 million smartwatches monthly  sales begin October: report
article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc is preparing to sell its first wearable device this October  aiming to produce 3 million to 5 million smartwatches a month in its initial run  the Nikkei reported on Friday  citing an unidentified parts supplier and sources familiar with the matter.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple allows 'approved' virtual currencies in Apps
article: Apple Inc will let software developers include virtual-currency transactions in their applications  paving the way for new forms of money to appear on iPhones and iPads.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple unwraps 'Healthkit' alongside Mac  iPhone features
article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc on Monday took the wraps off mobile applications that pool and analyze health and home data  kicking off an annual developers' conference lacking in big surprises  despite hopes the iPhone maker would offer a glimpse into its secretive pipeline of products.

name: Apple Inc
headline: U.S. court denies Apple's bid to delay e-books damages trial
article: NEW YORK A U.S. appeals court on Thursday rejected Apple Inc's  bid to delay a July trial to determine damages after the company was found to have colluded to fix the prices of e-books.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple to get Beats  music mogul Iovine for $3 billion
article: Apple Inc  will buy Beats for about $3 billion and bring recording mogul Jimmy Iovine into its ranks  hoping to win points with the music industry and help it catch up in fast-growing music streaming.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Nitto Denko to ease reliance on display business
article: OSAKA  Japan  May 27 Japan's Nitto Denko Corp   an Apple Inc supplier that makes industrial films and tapes  expects its reliance on volatile business in display screens to ease as it courts customers in autos and other industries  its chief executive said.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple supplier Hon Hai plans $310 mln GDR sale -paper
article: TAIPEI  May 26 Hon Hai Precision  a major supplier of Apple Inc  is set to raise about T$93 billion ($310 million) via selling new shares to foreign investors for its expansion overseas and into Taiwan's developing 4G telecom market  a local paper reported on Monday.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Boeing wants to be more like Apple  CEO McNerney says
article: SEATTLE Boeing Co Chief Executive Jim McNerney said the company wanted to be more like Apple Inc in the way it innovates  rather than doing a "moon shot" development every 25 years.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple strikes a new chord in the future of music
article: SAN FRANCISCO/LOS ANGELES More than a decade ago  the late Steve Jobs pulled one of his trademark reality distorting maneuvers  browbeating music label executives into selling songs on Apple Inc's then-nascent iTunes digital store for a mere 99 cents apiece.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Italy investigates mobile app practices at Apple  Google  Amazon
article: MILAN U.S. tech giants Apple  Google and Amazon and French game developer Gameloft are under investigation in Italy for alleged unfair commercial practices  the country's antitrust and competition authority said.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple  Google settle smartphone patent litigation
article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc and Google Inc's Motorola Mobility unit have agreed to settle all patent litigation between them over smartphone technology  ending one of the highest profile lawsuits in technology.

name: Apple Inc
headline: REFILE-UPDATE 1-With its sights on Apple  China smartphone maker Xiaomi unveils first tablet
article: BEIJING  May 15 Chinese budget smartphone maker Xiaomi unveiled on Thursday its first tablet  expanding its product lineup to directly challenge established rivals Samsung Electronics Co Ltd and Apple Inc.

name: Apple Inc
headline: UPDATE 2-U.S. court refuses to revive Samsung patent case against Apple
article: (Adds Apple share price  background on long-running patent fight)

name: Apple Inc

article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc has cut in half the time it takes to give refunds to online store customers who want to return their iPhones and other gadgets  a small but crucial step to try to get more people to buy direct from its website.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Former e-commerce executive pleads guilty in eBay insider case
article: A former executive at an e-commerce company that was acquired in 2011 by online retailer eBay Inc pleaded guilty on Friday to insider trading in connection with the takeover.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple close to buying Beats for $3.2 billion: source
article: SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc is close to paying a record $3.2 billion for Beats Electronics  two people with knowledge of the matter said  an expensive foray into music streaming and headphone gear that would mark a departure for the usually cash-conservative iPhone maker. | Video

name: Apple Inc
headline: Apple close to buying headphone maker Beats Electronics: FT
article: Apple Inc is close to buying headphone maker Beats Electronics for $3.2 billion  the Financial Times reported.

name: Apple Inc
headline: Huawei seeks to move up smartphone food chain with new Ascend P7
article: PARIS China's Huawei Technologies launched its second flagship smartphone  the Ascend P7  on Wednesday as part of its effort to crack the upper tier of the mobile market where Apple and Samsung still rule.
