article: SAN FRANCISCO  Sept 16 Chipmaker Nvidia  said on Monday it had appointed a former Cisco and Microsoft executive as its new chief financial officer  ending a search of more than two years after its previous CFO left.

name: Cisco Systems Inc

name: Cisco Systems Inc

article: * Wal-Mart slumps after sales decline; Cisco drags on tech shares

name: Cisco Systems Inc

article: Network equipment maker Cisco Systems Inc is cutting 4 000 jobs  or 5 percent of its workforce  as it makes a fresh attempt to reduce costs and refocus on growth areas as it faces uncertain demand for its networking equipment.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: S&P retreats after eight days of gains as Coca-Cola drags
article: NEW YORK The S&P 500 snapped its eight-day winning streak on Tuesday after disappointing sales from Coca-Cola  while investors turned cautious on the day before the Federal Reserve chairman's congressional testimony. | Video

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco to invest in Israeli venture capital funds

name: Cisco Systems Inc

name: Cisco Systems Inc

article: RAMALLAH  West Bank  May 31 At first glance  it is a tech utopian's dream. For the last two years  several dozen Palestinian entrepreneurs have been getting training from Israeli high tech experts courtesy of the American firm Cisco Systems.

name: Cisco Systems Inc

article: Network equipment maker Aruba Networks Inc  forecast fourth-quarter results well below Wall Street expectations hurt by rising competition from Cisco Systems Inc   sending its shares down 17 percent after the bell.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco profit beats Street  shares rise on outlook
article: NEW YORK Network equipment maker Cisco Systems Inc posted a higher than expected quarterly profit and said current-quarter revenue could increase  giving some relief to investors who had worried it was being hurt by weak technology spending.

name: Cisco Systems Inc

article: April 8 Cisco Systems  IBM and Citrix have joined forces with other tech companies in a consortium to kickstart the corporate market for software-defined networking (SDN)  aimed at making network management easier and cheaper.

name: Cisco Systems Inc

article: Cisco Systems Inc must pay $70 million in damages to patent licenser XpertUniverse Inc for fraudulently obtaining technology developed by the New York company  a jury found on Friday  according to court filings.

article: WASHINGTON  March 14 Lawmakers asked on Thursday whether a bill aimed at stopping abusive patent litigation that costs companies millions of dollars each year could end up hurting legitimate companies whose inventions have been infringed.

name: Cisco Systems Inc

article: Virtual networking company Embrane has won hosting company Peer1 as a customer for its Heleos product  beating out larger vendors such as Cisco Systems Inc and Juniper Networks Inc.

name: Cisco Systems Inc

article: SAO PAULO  Feb 7 The board of TIM Participaçoes SA  Brazil's second-largest wireless phone company  chose Rodrigo Abreu as its new chief executive  according to a securities filing on Thursday.

name: Cisco Systems Inc

article: Feb 6 Europe's economic slowdown and the introduction of caps on mobile data usage have slightly damped growth of mobile data traffic despite more mobile users  devices and machine-to-machine connections  according to Cisco Systems .

name: Cisco Systems Inc

article: SAN FRANCISCO Cisco Systems Inc is selling its home networking business to Belkin  the networking giant's latest move to exit the consumer business.

name: Cisco Systems Inc

article: Cisco Systems Inc said it will buy Israeli software maker Intucell for about $475 million in cash to expand its mobile network management offerings.

name: Cisco Systems Inc

article: MOSCOW Networking equipment company Cisco Systems Inc has acquired a small stake in Russian software developer Parallels  Parallels said on Thursday.

name: Cisco Systems Inc

article: * Tried Palo Alto Networks  could not agree value - sources

article: East Carolina University (ECU) has filed a lawsuit against Cisco Systems Inc over the use of its registered trademark "Tomorrow Starts Here"  which is central to the network equipment company's new marketing campaign.

name: Cisco Systems Inc

article: Networking equipment company Cisco Systems Inc  has hired Barclays  to sell its Linksys home router unit  a report said on Sunday.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco bets on software and services for mid-term growth
article: NEW YORK Cisco Systems laid out its mid-term growth strategy on Friday  betting on increased demand for software  services and security as it strives to become the world's leading information technology company.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: CORRECTED-RPT-INSIGHT-Lawyers gain from 'say-on-pay' suits targeting US firms
article: (Corrects 14th paragraph to show Cisco lawsuit has not been dismissed)

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco to buy privately held network software company
article: Cisco Systems Inc said it will buy privately held network traffic-management software maker Cariden Technologies Inc for about $141 million in cash.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: BRIEF-Cisco Systems shares up 1.2 percent in premarket trade
article: NEW YORK  Nov 19 Cisco Systems Inc :  * Shares up 1.2 percent in premarket trade

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco to buy Cloupia for $125 million
article: NEW YORK Cisco Systems  plans to buy Cloupia  a privately held data center software company  for about $125 million  including retention-based incentives.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Wall Street drops on deficit  Middle East concerns
article: NEW YORK Stocks slid on Wednesday with declines accelerating after President Barack Obama set up a drawn-out fight over the fiscal cliff when he stuck to his pledge to raise taxes on the wealthy  and as violence increased in the Middle East. | Video

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: UPDATE 3-Cisco sees slower growth in second quarter
article: * Q1 revenue up 6 pct at $11.9 bln vs Street view of $11.77 bln

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco to meet quarterly target  disappoint on outlook
article: Tech investors hoping for good news may have to look further than Cisco Systems Inc's  quarterly report as analysts expect Chief Executive John Chambers to be pessimistic in his forecast for the coming year.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco says Huawei misstated facts in 2003 copyright case
article: NEW YORK Cisco Systems on Thursday accused Huawei Technologies Co Ltd of misstating facts concerning their 2003 copyright infringement case and released segments from what it said was a previously sealed document.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: ZTE confirms Cisco has halted equipment deal
article: SHANGHAI ZTE Corp  China's second largest telecom equipment maker  said on Tuesday that Cisco Systems has terminated its agreement with the company  confirming an earlier Reuters report.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Exclusive: Cisco cuts ties to China's ZTE after Iran probe
article: LONDON Cisco Systems Inc. has ended a longstanding sales partnership with ZTE Corp after an internal investigation into allegations that the Chinese telecommunications equipment maker sold Cisco networking gear to Iran. | Video

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco taps two execs in CEO race
article: Networking equipment company Cisco Systems is expanding the roles of two executives it has identified as possible successors to long-serving Chief Executive John Chambers.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco CEO: Next U.S. president must take page from Clinton's book
article: NEW YORK Cisco Systems Inc CEO John Chambers  a supporter of Mitt Romney  says the country's next head of state should take his cues from former President Bill Clinton who was able to work effectively with businesses to generate jobs and create budget surpluses. | Video

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco CEO: Next US president must take page from Clinton's book
article: NEW YORK Cisco Systems Inc CEO John Chambers  a supporter of Mitt Romney  says the country's next head of state should take his cues from former President Bill Clinton  regardless of who emerges as the victor in November's election.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Ciena forecast weak as carriers delay projects; shares fall
article: Network equipment maker Ciena Corp  posted a higher-than-expected quarterly loss and forecast fourth-quarter revenue below estimates as customers delayed orders  sending its shares down 12 percent in premarket trading.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Analysis: Cisco  EMC partnership turning into rivalry
article: Cisco Systems Inc  the world's biggest network equipment maker  and EMC Corp  the leading data storage company  are increasingly encroaching on each other's turfs  in a sign their long partnership may be unraveling.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Wall Street hits four-month high  boosted by Germany  Cisco
article: NEW YORK The S&P 500 closed at its highest level since early April on Thursday after comments from German Chancellor Angela Merkel that appeared to support the European Central Bank's efforts to fight the region's debt crisis  while Cisco Systems jumped after it raised its dividend. | Video

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco still pessimistic on Europe  raises dividend
article: Cisco Systems Inc offered little hope that dire economic conditions in Europe would come to an end any time soon but pleased investors with a 75 percent dividend hike as the company posted quarterly results that beat estimates. | Video

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco's fourth quarter won't sparkle  but will deliver
article: Cisco Systems fourth quarter results may not renew the spark in Wall Street's fading love affair with the network equipment maker  but for those investors looking for a steady and predictable relationship the company is unlikely to disappoint.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: TEXT-S&P raises NDS Rtg to 'A+'; rtg withdrawn at issuer request
article: The rating action factors in NDS' enhanced credit profile  following its  acquisition by the U.S.-based technology firm Cisco Systems Inc.  (A+/Stable/A-1+). Cisco announced the completion of its acquisition  for  around $5 billion  on July 31  2012. The upgrade takes into account the  integration of all NDS' operations into Cisco's Service Provider Video  Technology Group division.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: S&P 500 extends rally to day five with slim gain
article: NEW YORK The Standard & Poor's 500 extended its rally to a fifth day on Thursday  again eking out a tiny gain as lingering expectations for economic stimulus from central banks lent support to a market lacking new catalysts. | Video

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco appoints Marc Benioff  Kristina Johnson as directors
article: NEW YORK Cisco Systems Inc  said on Thursday it had given board seats to Marc Benioff  head of salesforce.com   and Kristina Johnson  former U.S. under secretary of energy.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco to cut about 1 300 jobs
article: Network equipment maker Cisco Systems said on Monday that it plans to cut about 1 300 jobs as part of ongoing efforts to restructure the company.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: EU set to okay Cisco's $5 billion NDS deal: source
article: BRUSSELS U.S. network equipment maker Cisco is expected to gain unconditional EU approval for its $5 billion purchase of TV software developer NDS after regulators indicated the deal would not pose any serious competition concerns  a person familiar with the matter said on Friday.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Analysis: Cisco's loss is Palo Alto Networks' gain
article: NEW YORK When Cisco Systems Inc decided years ago to drop a network-security project known internally as "Apollo " little did it know it had paved the way for a startup to blossom into a formidable competitor.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco gives CTO stronger role in exec shift
article: Cisco Systems Inc's chief technology officer Padmasree Warrior is taking on the additional job of chief strategy officer but unlike her predecessor  Ned Hooper  she is not considered a contender to be CEO.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Fusion-io shares rise on Cisco contract
article: Shares of Fusion-io Inc  rose 9 percent after it won an original equipment manufacturing deal from Cisco Systems Inc .

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: UPDATE 1-Berenberg cuts Ericsson  Qualcomm  Imagination to sell
article: * Sees margin concerns  higher competition for tech companies

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: NDS says Cisco deal on track despite allegations
article: TEL AVIV Cisco's $5 billion acquisition of pay-TV smartcard maker NDS is on track despite the emergence of new allegations since the deal was announced that NDS used illegal means to undermine competitors  NDS's executive chairman told Reuters.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: TiVo countersues Cisco as DVR patent battle heats up
article: TiVo Inc countersued Cisco Systems Inc in a court over alleged infringement of four patents relating to digital video recorder (DVR) technology  days after Cisco filed a lawsuit against TiVo to void those same patents.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Exclusive: Iranian cell-phone carrier obtained banned U.S. tech
article: WASHINGTON A fast-growing Iranian mobile-phone network managed to obtain sophisticated U.S. computer equipment despite sanctions that prohibit sales of American technology to Iran  interviews and documents show.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco sues TiVo over DVRs
article: Cisco Systems Inc has filed a lawsuit to void four TiVo Inc patents related to digital video recorders  escalating a battle over who has the right to profit from sales of the popular machines.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: IP traffic to grow 29 percent per year through 2016: Cisco
article: Network equipment maker Cisco Systems Inc said Internet Protocol traffic is expected to grow at a compound annual rate of 29 percent in the next four years mainly due to strong demand for video and the prevalence of devices such as smartphones  tablets and chips that monitor energy consumption.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Companies less wary of personal devices at work-Cisco
article: Corporate IT departments in the United States are becoming less wary of staff bringing their personal devices to work  a Cisco  study showed  although security remains a top concern.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Corrected: Analysis: Cisco spooks  but IT spending seen on mend
article: As a cautious outlook from Cisco Systems Inc  pummels shares of the network equipment maker and its peers  it might be time to go bargain hunting.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Dow  S&P 500 end higher; Cisco weighs on tech
article: NEW YORK  May 10 The Dow and the S&P 500 eked out a slim gain on Thursday as investors dipped back into the market after a weak stretch  but a disappointing outlook from tech bellwether Cisco Systems and  caution about Europe limited gains.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco outlook underwhelms  economy fears persist
article: Cisco Systems Inc  forecast quarterly earnings below Wall Street's expectations  accentuating concerns about global technology spending and the network equipment maker's ability to weather persistent economic weakness. | Video

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Fusion-io may be in supply deal talks with Cisco: Piper Jaffray
article: Fusion-io Inc  might be working on a deal with Cisco Systems Inc  to supply its memory cards to the world's largest network equipment maker  Piper Jaffray said.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco to secure employees' personal devices
article: Cisco Systems  is expanding its services to enable companies to manage and secure private mobile devices used by employees at work  aiming to benefit from the trend widely known as BYOD or Bring Your Own Device.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: TEXT-S&P comments on Cisco Systems
article: March 19 - Standard & Poor's Ratings Services said today that San Jose  Calif.-based Cisco Systems Inc.'s March 15  2012 announcement of its intent to acquire U.K.-based NDS Group Ltd.  a provider of video security and content security solutions  does not affect our ratings on Cisco. The acquisition will cost approximately $5 billion in cash and will include assumption of debt and retention-based incentives.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco pumps up video offering with $5 billion NDS buy
article: Cisco Systems made its first major acquisition in over two years with a deal to buy NDS  which develops pay TV software  for $5 billion  aiming to boost its presence in the video communications market.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: SalesCrunch makes $1 bid for Cisco's WebEx
article: SalesCrunch  an Internet meeting platform  said it made an unsolicited bid to buy Cisco Systems Inc's  WebEx online videoconferencing unit for $1 plus a 15 percent stake in itself  a move interpreted by Cisco as a publicity stunt.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Arista Networks fends off buyers  looks at IPO
article: NEW YORK Arista Networks  a company formed by Cisco Systems Inc  veterans that makes fast network switches used in high-frequency trading  has rebuffed takeover overtures from larger rivals and is instead having internal discussions to go public  possibly as soon as this year or early next.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: More mobile devices than people by 2016: Cisco
article: Between 2011 and 2016 the amount of mobile data traffic will grow at a compound annual rate of 78 percent as the number of mobile devices connected to the Internet exceeds the number of people on Earth in four years' time  according to a study by Cisco Systems Inc.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco slips as fragile recovery fails to impress
article: Shares of Cisco Systems Inc  fell 3 percent  a day after the network equipment maker's estimate-beating forecast failed to impress  suggesting investors may still be wary of its restructuring efforts paying off so early.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco Q3 revenue outlook strong after Q2 beat
article: Network equipment maker Cisco Systems Inc promised further revenue growth after its second quarter results beat estimates  thanks to a restructuring  leading to a dividend increase.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco seen reporting solid second quarter
article: A year after network equipment maker Cisco Systems Inc unnerved investors with yet another weak quarterly outlook the company looks set to report a stable quarter buoyed in part by improving enterprise demand in the United States.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco shelves home telepresence amid company revamp
article: Network equipment maker Cisco Systems has decided to pull the plug on umi  a home video conferencing system it once touted as a quality alternative to popular video chat service Skype -- as it continues with its restructuring plans.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: JP Morgan upgrades Cisco to overweight;shares rise
article: Investment bank JPMorgan upgraded its recommendation for Cisco Systems to "overweight" and raised its price target for the network equipment maker on expectations of a rebound in public sector spending and improved margins in 2012.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Analysis: Cisco set on proving it can succeed in tablet market
article: Cisco Systems Inc is stepping up its push to sell its Cius tablet computers to corporate customers  defying skeptics who say the product is short of the sex appeal and brand recognition it would need to win over the workforce.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Global cloud data traffic growing rapidly: Cisco
article: Network equipment maker Cisco Systems Inc said global cloud data traffic will grow at a compound annual rate of 66 percent between 2010 and 2015  as consumers and businesses seek untethered access to content and applications.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Polycom plunges on competitor worries
article: Polycom Inc  shares fell by more than a third on Thursday  a day after the videoconferencing company forecast dismal fourth-quarter sales in the face of slow corporate spending and increased competition from rivals like Cisco Systems .

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: UPDATE 1-GSI Tech cuts outlook as sales to Cisco dip
article: Oct 13 GSI Technology Inc trimmed its second-quarter revenue outlook hurt by lower sales to its largest client Cisco Systems and softness in demand from its Asian customers.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Fitch slams proposed foreign profit tax break
article: WASHINGTON Giving corporations a tax break on their overseas profits likely would not boost the economy or jobs  said credit rating agency Fitch Inc on Thursday after two senators unveiled a tax "holiday" bill.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Siemens Enterprise CEO says orders stabilizing
article: NEW YORK Siemens Enterprise Communications Inc  a provider of communications equipment and software to corporations  is seeing demand stabilize after a severe collapse in orders earlier this year  according to the company's chief executive officer.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Emerson unit head says IT executives wary of spending
article: SAN FRANCISCO Economic troubles in the United States and Europe are making customers of Emerson Electric Co's data center management business reluctant to make big purchases as the company prepares to launch a major new platform.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Poor nations urged to tap Web fast for growth
article: NAIROBI With online business increasingly driving economic growth  developing nations' top priority should be the infrastructure their citizens need to get connected  delegates at an Internet conference in Nairobi said this week.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: COLUMN-Green indices muddy sustainable investing-Gerard Wynn
article: (Gerard Wynn is a Reuters market analyst. The views expressed are his own)

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Oracle expects strong Q2  firms up tech outlook
article: Oracle Corp forecast earnings for the current quarter that are higher than expected  as well as robust software sales  offering some reassurance to investors hoping that global technology spending is holding up.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Oracle delivers strong Q1 but hardware slips
article: Oracle Corp posted solid quarterly results that appeared to defy a weak global technology spending outlook but its weakening hardware sales left investors unimpressed.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Tech start-up targets emerging corporate mobile mkt
article: HELSINKI  Sept 19 Venture capital-backed telecom gear startup SpiderCloud Wireless aims to tap into the emerging market of small wireless networks which can be used inside offices  shopping centers and stadiums.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Most Asian nations realizing Internet cannot be tamed
article: SINGAPORE It's not just dictators. Governments around the world  many of them popularly elected  have tried for years to control the Internet and social media  dismayed by their potential to incite violence  spread mischief and distribute pornography and dissent.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: US STOCKS-Techs lift Wall St but euro zone fears weigh
article: * Business inventories signal caution  retail sales flat

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco slashes sales outlook  enters new era
article: SAN FRANCISCO/NEW YORK Cisco Systems Inc slashed its long-term forecasts  acknowledging an end to an era of scorching growth after cutting thousands of jobs in a sweeping four-month reorganization.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: How to play it: Potential winners on Obama's Jobs Act plan
article: * THE ISSUE: President Barack Obama called on Congress late Thursday to pass a $447 billion package of spending initiatives and tax cuts to boost economic growth and generate jobs. Here are several investment ideas based on his proposals.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Dealtalk: Anti-trust shadow looms over European telco deals
article: LONDON The block on AT&T's $39 billion purchase of T-Mobile USA is a grim reminder of the need to do anti-trust homework on deals in mature  slow growth telecoms markets and could put some European players off their takeover plans.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Analysis: Outlook for tech spending getting darker
article: BOSTON Hopes are rapidly dwindling that there will be even modest growth in technology spending during the second half of 2011. And 2012 may be no better.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Warburg Pincus hires Cisco's top dealmaker
article: NEW YORK Private equity firm Warburg Pincus  said on Monday it had hired Charles Carmel  Cisco Systems Inc's  top dealmaker  who led the tech giant's acquisitions of WebEx and Scientific Atlanta.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Tech Data Q2 beats  sees steady demand
article: BANGALORE Tech Data Corp reported a quarterly profit that handily beat expectations on stronger foreign currencies and a 30 percent growth at its European business  and forecast a mid-single digit sales growth for the third quarter.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: HP  Dell hammered as tech-spending outlook darkens
article: BANGALORE/SAN FRANCISCO Shares of Hewlett-Packard Co and Dell Inc fell on Wednesday as the outlook for U.S. and European corporate government technology spending dimmed.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Analysis: Company report pace frustrates accounting experts
article: NEW YORK Author and lawyer Michael Young jokes about the days when it took more time to get some companies' financial statements than it did for Columbus to discover America.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Berkowitz's Fairholme slashes U.S. stock holdings
article: NEW YORK  Aug 15 Bruce Berkowitz's Fairholme Capital Group roughly halved its U.S. stock holdings in the second quarter by moving some of its money into more concentrated bets like insurer American International Group   according to a regulatory filing.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: US STOCKS-Wall St rises for 2nd day  retail sales data help
article: * Indexes up: Dow 1 pct  S&P 0.8 pct  Nasdaq 0.3 pct

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Wall Street roars back but selling may return
article: NEW YORK Stocks shot up 4 percent on Thursday as bargain-hungry investors overcame the recent wave of fear that drove selling over the last two weeks. | Video

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: UPDATE 5-Cisco surpasses low expectations  shares pop
article: * Shares swing north after hours  (Adds Q1 forecast and industry outlook  analyst's comment)

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco  networking companies deal with more bad news
article: SAN FRANCISCO Wall Street underestimated the effect of cuts in government spending on the networking industry and may have to curtail its expectations again with growing fears of a global economic slowdown.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: UPDATE 1-Half-dozen Juniper executives jump ship for Cisco
article: * Juniper says its client relationships remain intact  (Adds Juniper response)

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cavium forecasts Q3 sales below Wall Street  shares
article: Chipmaker Cavium Inc  posted a quarterly profit above market estimates  helped by strong growth in its broadband and consumer business  but forecast weaker-than-expected third-quarter revenue  sending its shares down 10 percent after hours.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: UPDATE 3-Foxconn to rely more on robots; could use 1 mln in 3 yrs
article: * Company to use 1 million robots within 3 years - newspaper

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Ricoh  Vidyo in new videoconferencing deal
article: HELSINKI Video technology start-up Vidyo unveiled on Friday a deal to supply its software to Ricoh's  new small videoconferencing offering  which it expects to "significantly disrupt" the $3 billion equipment market.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Microsoft use of low-tax havens drives down tax bill
article: FAIRFIELD  Connecticut If you want to know why tax from surging corporate profits isn't making much of a dent in the United States' crippling budget deficit  a glance at Microsoft Corp's recent results provides some clues.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: REFILE-FUNDVIEW-Silvant Capital bets on Baidu  midcap network gear makers
article: * Bearish on optical gear makers Finisar  JDS Uniphase

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: UPDATE 4-Celestica profits triples  shares jump
article: * Company sees demand influenced by economic uncertainty

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: UPDATE 2-Polycom Q2 beat fails to stem competition worries
article: (Adds bullets  details  background in paragaph 2-5  adds share movement)

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Analysis: Dell challenges Cisco with networking deal
article: NEW YORK Dell Inc's deal on Wednesday to buy Force10 Networks will give the world's second-largest computer maker inroads into Cisco Systems Inc's turf -- networking.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco to cut workforce by 15 percent  sell factory to Hon Hai
article: NEW YORK/SAN FRANCISCO Cisco Systems plans to cut 15 percent of its staff and sell a set-top box factory as part of a plan to cut annual expenses by $1 billion as the network equipment maker tries to revive its fortunes.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco to cut workforce by 15 percent  sell factory
article: NEW YORK/SAN FRANCISCO Cisco Systems plans to cut 15 percent of its jobs and sell a factory as part of a plan to cut annual expenses by $1 billion as the network equipment maker tries to revive its fortunes.

name: Cisco Systems Inc
headline: Cisco could eliminate as many as 10 000 jobs: report
article: SAN FRANCISCO Networking equipment company Cisco Systems Inc  could eliminate as many as 10 000 jobs  or about 14 percent of its workforce  to revive profit growth  Bloomberg said  citing two people familiar with the matter.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Cable group urges antitrust probe of Comcast and Trump tweets support
article: WASHINGTON President Donald Trump tweeted his support on Monday for a call by a cable industry group to investigate alleged anti-competitive practices by Comcast Corp  the world's biggest entertainment company.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast plans to roll out new video-streaming device: source
article: Comcast Corp  is planning to launch a product that will allow its broadband subscribers to aggregate some video streaming applications  including Netflix  Amazon Prime and YouTube  according to a source familiar with the matter.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: High-speed data boom drives Comcast profit beat
article: Comcast Corp's  quarterly profit and revenue topped Wall Street estimates on Thursday as strength in its high-speed internet business offset a less severe drop in cable TV subscribers.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast says its fastest internet reaches more U.S. homes than any other provider
article: Comcast Corp said on Thursday that its fastest-speed gigabit internet service now reaches more homes than any other provider in the United States after it completed rollout to nearly all 58 million homes and businesses it serves.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: UK seeks additional reassurances from Comcast on independence of Sky News
article: LONDON Britain has sought additional reassurances from cable company Comcast  over the editorial independence of the Sky News television channel following the U.S. group's takeover of broadcaster Sky .

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast to stop buying Sky shares in the market
article: LONDON Comcast said it would stop buying Sky's shares in the market after it secured 38 percent of the stock plus the 39 percent holding from Rupert Murdoch in the $40 billion takeover.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Rupert Murdoch's Fox to sell Sky stake to Comcast
article: Twenty-First Century Fox Inc  agreed to sell its 39 percent stake in Sky PLC  to Comcast Corp   the companies said on Wednesday  a deal that completes the U.S. cable group's takeover and ends Rupert Murdoch's relationship with the UK-based satellite broadcaster.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast crosses 30 percent Sky threshold after buying shares
article: LONDON Comcast   the victor in the $40 billion auction for Sky   said on Tuesday it had bought more than 30 percent of the European pay-TV group's shares in the market.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Breakingviews - Comcast $40 bln lunacy gives Disney shot at sanity
article: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - It’s been a year of media madness. Comcast’s $40 billion lurch for Sky set a new standard for excess. Walt Disney too paid an extravagant sum for parts of Rupert Murdoch’s empire  including a stake in the UK pay-TV group. Selling it would allow CEO Bob Iger to reduce the Magic Kingdom’s debt or add firepower to battle streaming rivals like Netflix.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: RPT-UPDATE 4-Comcast outbids Fox with $40 billion winning offer for Sky
article: * Comcast bids 17.28 pounds a share in dramatic rapid auction

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Breakingviews - Comcast overreaches for Sky with $40 bln knockout
article: LONDON (Reuters Breakingviews) - Comcast  has overreached in its pursuit of Sky. The U.S. cable giant prevailed over Twenty-First Century Fox  on Saturday  winning a dramatic one-day auction with an offer that values the UK broadcaster at 30.6 billion pounds ($40 billion). For Chief Executive Brian Roberts  it’s a huge bet on overseas growth for a company that cannot get much larger at home.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast and Fox take $34 billion battle for Britain's Sky to the wire
article: LONDON Comcast  and Twenty-First Century Fox  face a quick-fire auction for British broadcaster Sky  on Saturday after neither side backed down in a drawn-out $34 billion battle.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast says Sky shareholders have until October 6 to accept offer
article: Comcast Corp's bid of 14.75 pounds for each Sky share will now remain open for acceptance until early October  the U.S. cable giant said on Wednesday  adding that it has received valid acceptances for shares representing 0.29 percent of Sky Plc to date.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Auction battle looms for Comcast and Fox as Sky bidding deadline nears
article: LONDON Britain's takeover regulator could take the rare step of intervening in the battle between Comcast and Twenty-First Century Fox for Sky next month by staging an auction for the broadcaster to bring the drawn-out bidding war to an end.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast to continue offering Fox's Big Ten Network
article: Comcast Corp  will continue to offer 21st Century Fox Inc's  Big Ten Network  including all games on Fox's sports channel FS1  the companies said on Friday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast gets valid acceptances for less than 1 percent of Sky shares
article: Comcast Corp said it had received valid acceptances for shares representing just 0.21 percent of Sky Plc after its 14.75 pound per share offer to buy 61 percent of the European broadcaster.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Fox's formal bid opens final chapter of Sky battle with Comcast
article: Twenty-First Century Fox Inc  has triggered a 46 day deadline to raise its bid for Sky  in a battle with Comcast  for control of the British pay-TV group. | Video

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast shares rise on internet customer  profit growth
article: Comcast Corp  on Thursday reported a quarterly profit that beat Wall Street estimates as it added more high-speed internet customers  part of a push to diversify away from the shrinking U.S. pay-TV market. | Video

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast concedes to Disney in bidding war for Fox assets
article: Comcast Corp  dropped its $66 billion bid for Twenty-First Century Fox Inc's  entertainment assets on Thursday but said it would still try to expand its international footprint by acquiring 61 percent of European broadcaster Sky Plc   the remainder of which is owned by Fox. | Video

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Fox shares drop as prospects of new Comcast bid fade
article: Twenty-First Century Fox Inc  shares dropped more than 2 percent on Monday  as investors viewed the absence of a new bid by Comcast Corp  for most of Fox's assets as meaning its bidding war with Walt Disney Co  for them is likely over.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast to pay advisers as much as 243 million pound in fees for Sky takeover
article: LONDON Comcast  expects to pay the banks  law firms and other advisers on its 25.9 billion pound ($34.23 billion) bid for Sky  as much as 243 million pounds if it wins the battle for the British broadcaster  the U.S. cable giant said on Friday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Breakingviews - One number in Fox bid battle just gets smaller
article: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - The price tag for Twenty-First Century Fox assets keeps increasing as Walt Disney and Comcast fight for bits of Rupert Murdoch’s empire. Yet one number just gets smaller: the return on investment for whoever wins.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: UPDATE 7-Comcast raises bid for Sky to $34 bln  tops Fox's offer
article: LONDON  July 11 Comcast Corp on Wednesday raised its all-cash offer for Britain's Sky to $34 billion  topping a raised bid of $32.5 billion for the pay-TV group from Rupert Murdoch's Twenty-First Century Fox .

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Fox preparing to top Comcast offer for Sky: FT
article: Twenty-First Century Fox Inc  is preparing a new bid for Sky Plc  that values it at about 25 billion pounds  ($33.14 billion) to top the offer it has received from Comcast Corp   the Financial Times reported on Monday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast says services being restored after outage
article: Comcast Corp  said on Friday services interrupted by two separate incidents of fiber cuts at its network providers    were being restored.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Fox shareholder urges Murdoch to give Comcast time to beat Disney bid
article: TCI Fund Management Ltd  a large Twenty-First Century Fox Inc  shareholder  has urged Fox executive chairman Rupert Murdoch to give Comcast Corp  a chance to top Walt Disney Co's  $71 billion offer to buy most of Fox's assets  according to a letter reviewed by Reuters.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: UPDATE 1-Disney willing to divest more Fox assets for deal clearance
article: June 21 Walt Disney Co said on Thursday it was willing to divest Twenty-First Century Fox Inc assets that generated up to $1 billion in earnings before interest  tax  depreciation and amortization (EBITDA) to get a regulatory nod for the deal.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Disney hikes bid for Fox assets to $71.3 billion  tops Comcast
article: Walt Disney Co raised its bid for the bulk of Twenty-First Century Fox Inc's film and television assets to $71.3 billion on Wednesday  sweetening its deal with cash as it looks to upend Comcast Corp's $65 billion offer. | Video

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast gains unconditional EU antitrust approval to buy Sky
article: BRUSSELS EU antitrust regulators have given the green light to U.S. cable company Comcast's plan to acquire European pay-TV group Sky without demanding concessions.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast offers $65 billion to lure Fox from Disney bid
article: Comcast Corp  offered $65 billion on Wednesday to lure Twenty-First Century Fox Inc  away from a merger with Walt Disney Co   setting up a bidding war between two of the largest U.S. media companies with its 20 percent higher offer. | Video

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast to win unconditional EU okay for Sky bid: sources
article: BRUSSELS U.S. cable company Comcast is set to gain unconditional EU antitrust approval for its bid to buy European pay-TV company Sky   two people familiar with the matter said on Friday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Britain clears way for Murdoch to battle Comcast for Sky
article: LONDON Rupert Murdoch faces a 22 billion pound ($29.3 billion) fight with U.S. cable company Comcast for European pay-TV company Sky after Britain cleared his bid providing he sells off its TV news business. | Video

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Fox sets Disney deal vote for July 10
article: May 30 Twenty-First Century Fox Inc will hold a special meeting on July 10th for its stockholders to vote on a proposed merger with Walt Disney Co  the company said on Wednesday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Breakingviews - How Comcast can boost its chances of snaring Fox
article: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - Comcast can boost its chances of snaring Fox. The cable company is preparing to scuttle Walt Disney’s $52.4 billion bid for some of Rupert Murdoch’s media assets  and a major Fox shareholder is receptive to the idea. But Comcast Chief Executive Brian Roberts may want to offer more than just the best price to get a hearing.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Breakingviews - Comcast earns its peacock feathers
article: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - Comcast is earning its peacock feathers. The $170 billion U.S. media firm was early and careful expanding beyond cable. Two examples are its purchase of NBC Universal - originally with its peacock logo - and a recently launched wireless phone service. Comcast stock has trounced the shares of Verizon Communications and AT&T. The company led by Brian Roberts has even pulled away from Walt Disney's market value this year.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Harry Potter conjures Japanese growth for Comcast
article: HONG KONG (Reuters Breakingviews) - With Harry Potter's help  Comcast can conjure up growth in sleepy Japan. The biggest U.S. cable operator is paying 255 billion yen ($2.3 billion) to buy out Goldman Sachs and other partners in Universal Studios Japan. The Osaka theme park's success  thanks partly to the boy wizard  highlights a part of the economy where domestic consumption growth is no illusion.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast nears deal with Charter on $18-$20 billion in divestitures: source
article: Comcast may divest about 4 million subscribers after its merger with Time Warner Cable and is working to reach an accord to sell a portion of those customers to Charter Communications  a source familiar with the matter said Tuesday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Netflix gloves come off against Comcast-Time Warner Cable merger
article: April 21 Video streaming service Netflix on Monday became the most visible company with a business relationship with Comcast to oppose the No. 1 cable operator's $45.3 billion merger with Time Warner Cable.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast in talks with Charter over divestitures: source
article: Comcast Corp  is in talks with Charter Communications  over selling or spinning off roughly 3 million subscribers worth approximately $18 billion to $20 billion as part of the divestitures related to its $45.3 billion takeover of Time Warner Cable   according to a source familiar with the matter.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Washington Post editorial backs Comcast-TWC merger with conditions
article: WASHINGTON U.S. regulators should approve the proposed $45.2 billion merger of two biggest U.S. cable providers Comcast Corp and Time Warner Cable Inc  but set "clear conditions " Washington Post's editorial board said on Tuesday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: U.S. lawmakers press Comcast on Time Warner Cable merger
article: WASHINGTON Comcast Corp and Time Warner Cable Inc executives sought to reassure lawmakers on Wednesday that their planned merger would not send cable TV prices skyrocketing but found a fair amount of congressional skepticism.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast defends Time Warner Cable deal as U.S. review kicks off
article: WASHINGTON/NEW YORK Comcast Corp sought to rebut critics of its planned $45.2 billion takeover of Time Warner Cable Inc  arguing that newcomers like Google Inc and Apple Inc would ensure competition in both Internet and video markets.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast  Time Warner executives to face critic at merger hearing
article: WASHINGTON Comcast Corp and Time Warner Cable Inc executives will face one of the toughest critics of their proposed merger when they go before a U.S. Senate panel this week.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast: Business services is sweet spot in Time Warner Cable deal
article: Selling Internet and phone service to businesses is hardly the sexiest part of the cable industry  but it has got a definite allure for the architects of the $45.2 billion merger of Comcast and Time Warner Cable.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast divestitures may be worth roughly $18 billion: source
article: The 3 million subscribers that Comcast Corp plans to divest as part of a proposed takeover of Time Warner Cable Inc might be worth roughly $18 billion  according to a source familiar with the matter.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Time Warner Cable rejects Charter's call to drop Comcast merger
article: Time Warner Cable Inc said on Friday it was committed to a deal reached with larger cable operator Comcast Corp in response to calls by Charter Communications that shareholders reject the $45 billion merger.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast's Cohen to testify on Time Warner Cable merger
article: WASHINGTON Comcast Corp's Executive Vice President David Cohen will testify at a hearing in the U.S. Senate on April 9 about his company's plans to buy Time Warner Cable Inc  a Comcast spokeswoman said on Thursday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Americans take dim view of Comcast  Time Warner Cable deal
article: WASHINGTON A majority of Americans are skeptical about the proposed merger of Comcast Corp  and Time Warner Cable Inc   and they are not convinced the U.S. government is doing enough to prevent monopolies generally  according to a Reuters/Ipsos online poll released on Wednesday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: U.S. Senate panel delays hearing on Comcast merger
article: WASHINGTON The U.S. Senate Judiciary Committee has postponed a hearing on Comcast's plan to merge with Time Warner Cable until April 9  the committee said on Tuesday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Apple in talks with Comcast for streaming-TV service: WSJ
article: Apple Inc is in talks with Comcast Corp to enter into a deal for a streaming-television service that would allow Apple set-top boxes to bypass congestion on the web  the Wall Street Journal reported  citing people familiar with the matter. | Video

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Netflix CEO calls for free interconnection  criticizes Comcast
article: March 20 Netflix Inc Chief Executive Reed Hastings on Thursday said internet service providers should give content companies adequate network connections for free  and singled out Comcast Corp for supporting "weak" internet traffic rules.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Time Warner Cable CEO to get $80 million in golden parachute
article: Time Warner Cable Chief Executive Rob Marcus stands to make about $80 million if Comcast's deal to buy Time Warner Cable closes  according to a regulatory filing on Thursday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Exclusive: States to probe Comcast plan to buy Time Warner Cable
article: WASHINGTON Florida and other U.S. states will join the Justice Department in seeking to determine if Comcast's plan to merge with Time Warner Cable is legal under U.S. antitrust law  Florida officials told Reuters.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: RPT-Comcast deal may offer media companies leverage on fees
article: LOS ANGELES/NEW YORK  March 13 Media companies plan to press Comcast Corp for higher fees in the coming year  seeing an opportunity to squeeze better terms from the U.S. cable company as regulators review its planned takeover of Time Warner Cable Inc.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast deal may offer media companies leverage on fees
article: LOS ANGELES/NEW YORK Media companies plan to press Comcast Corp for higher fees in the coming year  seeing an opportunity to squeeze better terms from the U.S. cable company as regulators review its planned takeover of Time Warner Cable Inc.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: U.S. Senate Judiciary panel sets hearing on Comcast merger
article: WASHINGTON The U.S. Senate Judiciary Committee will hold a hearing on Comcast's plan to merge with Time Warner Cable in April and another on retransmission issues in late March  the committee said on Wednesday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Media executives question Comcast-Time Warner Cable deal
article: One of the top executives of Twenty-First Century Fox Inc has raised questions about Comcast's potential dominance of the U.S. broadband Internet market if regulators allow its $45.2 billion merger with Time Warner Cable to be completed.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: U.S. antitrust chief recused on Comcast  Time Warner Cable review
article: WASHINGTON The top U.S. antitrust enforcer  Bill Baer  will be recused from reviewing Comcast Corp's proposed deal to buy Time Warner Cable Inc  the U.S. Justice Department said on Thursday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast expands low-income Internet service as merger review nears
article: Comcast Corp on Tuesday said its discounted Internet service for low-income families will be available indefinitely  a move that should please U.S. regulators as the company seeks approval for its $45.2 billion takeover of Time Warner Cable.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Fake emergency alert in movie ad draws fines for U.S. media firms
article: WASHINGTON A U.S. advertisement for a movie that sounded like an emergency alert has drawn fines of $1.9 million for media companies Viacom Inc and Comcast Corp's NBCUniversal and ESPN  co-controlled by Walt Disney Co. after viewer complaints.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast would consider a spinoff of subscribers: source
article: Comcast is considering spinning off the 3 million subscribers it has offered to divest as part of its proposed $45.2 billion takeover of Time Warner Cable  into a publicly traded company  according to sources familiar with the matter.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: TiVo beats on sales  sees gains from Comcast-Time Warner deal
article: Digital video recorder maker TiVo Inc  reported a better-than-expected 20 percent rise in quarterly revenue and said it expects to benefit from Comcast Corp's  $45.2 billion acquisition of Time Warner Cable .

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: UPDATE 2-Netflix may need to pay AT&T  Verizon for faster speeds
article: Feb 24 Netflix Inc  which agreed to pay Comcast Corp for faster video delivery  may have to make similar arrangements with other broadband providers to ensure customers get trouble-free access to its streaming movies and TV shows.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Senate committee sets date for Comcast  Time Warner Cable hearing
article: WASHINGTON The Senate Judiciary Committee plans to hold a hearing on March 26 to examine how the proposed merger of Comcast Corp and Time Warner Cable Inc would affect consumers  the committee's chairman said on Monday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Netflix to pay Comcast for faster speeds
article: Netflix has agreed to pay one of the largest broadband providers in the United States Comcast Corp for faster speeds  throwing open the possibility that more content companies will have to shell out for better service.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Dish profit rises  chairman criticizes Comcast/TWC deal
article: Satellite TV provider Dish Network Corp reported a 38 percent rise in fourth-quarter profit on Friday and the company's chairman said he saw "nothing good" for competitors if U.S. regulators approve the merger of Comcast Corp and Time Warner Cable.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast filings with regulators expected at end of March
article: WASHINGTON Comcast Corp said on Thursday it plans to submit documents on its proposed $45 billion takeover of Time Warner Cable Inc to U.S. regulators by the end of March  when antitrust and public interest reviews will be launched.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Fitch Rates Comcast's Sr. Unsecured Notes 'A-'; Outlook Stable
article: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  February 19 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned an 'A-' rating to  Comcast Corporation's (Comcast) benchmark size  senior unsecured notes maturing  2024 and 2044. Proceeds from the offering are expected to be used for general  corporate purposes which may include the repayment of amounts outstanding under  the company's commercial paper program and a portion of NBCUniversal's $900  million principal amount of 2.1% notes due Apri

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast turns to Davis Polk for Time Warner Cable merger
article: WASHINGTON Comcast Corp  will again be working with its longtime antitrust counsel at Davis Polk & Wardwell  as the communications and entertainment group seeks to navigate the U.S. approval process to merge with rival Time Warner Cable Inc .

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast takeover of Time Warner Cable to reshape U.S. pay TV
article: Comcast Corp's proposed $45.2 billion takeover of Time Warner Cable Inc could face close scrutiny from U.S. antitrust regulators because of the deal's potential to reshape the country's pay TV and broadband markets. | Video

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast beefs up online offering with Warner Brothers movies
article: Feb 11 Comcast Corp will offer its subscribers the option to buy "Gravity" and other Warner Brothers movies for download and streaming  expanding the largest U.S. cable operator's push into digital movie sales  the company said on Tuesday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: As Olympics loom  NBC leads in the race for prized viewers
article: Comcast Corp's NBC network  for years a ratings laggard  is ahead in a key contest among broadcasters even before it attracts millions of viewers this month to its marquee event  the Winter Olympics.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast adds video customers; NBC Universal unit improves
article: Comcast Corp  on Tuesday reported that it added more video subscribers than expected in the fourth quarter and beat cash flow estimates at its NBC Universal media unit  sending shares up more than 1 percent.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast eyes Time Warner Cable's East Coast markets: source
article: NEW YORK No 1 cable provider Comcast  in its talks with Charter about a possible deal to acquire parts of Time Warner Cable  would be interested in an agreement that gives Comcast the New York market and parts of New England  a person familiar with the matter said on Friday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Time Warner Cable deal likely to have strings attached by regulators
article: WASHINGTON Any expansion by cable provider Comcast  including a deal with Charter Communications to split provider Time Warner Cable between them  would get a tough review from U.S. regulators  who might use the proposal to force Internet providers to treat all traffic equally  antitrust experts said.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Exclusive: Charter makes new approach to Comcast on Time Warner Cable bid - sources
article: NEW YORK Charter Communications Inc reached out to Comcast Corp this week about teaming up to buy Time Warner Cable Inc  after Time Warner Cable rejected its $37.3 billion buyout bid  according to people familiar with the matter.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Golden Globe Awards draws best TV audience in 10 years
article: LOS ANGELES Sunday's telecast of the 71st annual Golden Globe Awards drew its best audience in the past decade as 20.9 million people tuned in to watch the Hollywood awards show  Comcast Corp-owned network NBC said on Monday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast sees first video customer growth in six years in fourth quarter: CEO
article: Comcast Corp slightly expanded its video customer base during the last three months of 2013  the first quarterly growth in more than six years  Comcast Chief Executive Brian Roberts said on Tuesday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Exclusive: Universal takes writedown on new Keanu Reeves film
article: Los Angeles Comcast Corp's Universal Pictures movie studio has taken unspecified write-downs for its $175 million  Keanu Reeves film "47 Ronin" that opens on Christmas Day  the studio has acknowledged  as Hollywood neared the end of a year of big budget bombs.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast CEO meets with top U.S. communications regulator
article: WASHINGTON Comcast CEO Brian Roberts met with Federal Communications Commission Chairman Tom Wheeler on Thursday  the company's spokeswoman said  at a time when the cable provider considers a bid for Time Warner Cable.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: US STOCKS-Wall Street little changed as Fed set to meet
article: * Indexes: Dow up 0.05 pct  S&P down 0.2 pct  Nasdaq off 0.16 pct

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Exclusive: Comcast weighs three options for Time Warner Cable deal: sources
article: NEW YORK Comcast Corp is examining three scenarios for a potential deal with Time Warner Cable  including a full takeover bid for the second-largest cable operator  people close to the situation said on Monday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Exclusive: Comcast taps JPMorgan on potential Time Warner Cable bid - sources
article: NEW YORK Top U.S. cable provider Comcast Corp has tapped JPMorgan Chase & Co for advice as it evaluates a potential bid for Time Warner Cable Inc  people familiar with the matter said.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Singer Rita Ora joins 'Fifty Shades of Grey' film
article: LOS ANGELES British R&B singer Rita Ora will be the latest addition to Universal Pictures' "Fifty Shades of Grey" film  the Comcast Corp-owned studio said on Monday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast tests new ad tech to help networks capture binge viewers
article: Comcast Corp  the largest U.S. cable operator  is testing new advertising technology that inserts up-to-date commercials into past episodes of TV shows that are available on demand  a development that could help television networks generate additional revenue.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: UPDATE 1-Comcast  Charter consider joint bid for Time Warner Cable -report
article: (Adds details from Bloomberg report  jump in share prices)

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast to sell digital movies through cable boxes  website
article: LOS ANGELES Comcast Corp plans to start selling movies for download and streaming through the cable operator's set-top boxes and its Xfinity TV website  according to people with knowledge of the plan.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Exclusive - Comcast to sell movies for download  streaming: sources
article: LOS ANGELES Comcast Corp plans to start selling movies for download and streaming through the cable operator's set-top boxes and its Xfinity TV website  according to people with knowledge of the plan.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Time Warner CEO sees growth for HBO; Q3 profit tops view
article: Time Warner Inc's third-quarter profit beat estimates  driven by growth at its cable networks  and its chief executive said on Wednesday a new cable package offered by No. 1 cable operator Comcast would help HBO expand its subscriber base.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast could license tech to other U.S. cable operators: executive
article: A top Comcast Corp executive said on Wednesday that the company is in talks to license its latest technology  called X1  to other cable operators  which would help the industry better compete with telecom and satellite rivals.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Netflix CEO hopeful for deals with Comcast  others
article: LOS ANGELES Netflix Inc CEO Reed Hastings said on Monday he was hopeful the company would reach a deal with Comcast Corp and other pay television providers to offer his company's movie and TV streaming service through cable set-top boxes.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Netflix CEO 'hopeful' for deals with Comcast  other providers
article: LOS ANGELES Netflix CEO Reed Hastings said on Monday he was "hopeful" the company would reach a deal with Comcast Corp and other pay television providers to offer his company's movie and TV streaming service through cable set-top boxes.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Market Chatter- Corporate finance press digest
article: Oct 14 The following corporate finance-related stories were reported by media:

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Netflix in talks with U.S. cable companies: WSJ
article: NEW YORK Netflix Inc is in talks with several U.S. cable television companies including Comcast Corp and Suddenlink Communications to make its streaming video service available through their set-top boxes  the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday  citing people familiar with the matter.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast rolls out remote control accessed through Twitter
article: Comcast Corp announced on Wednesday that it developed a new remote control feature in partnership with Twitter that allows users to turn the channel through a tweet.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast to bid for Houston sports network if court forces sale
article: Comcast Corp is prepared to bid if it can force a sale of the financially troubled  regional-sports network that carries the games of the Houston Astros baseball team and the Houston Rockets  the city's basketball team  court papers show.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: NBC chief Greenblatt extends contract through 2017
article: Sept 20 NBC Entertainment Chairman Robert Greenblatt has extended his contract with the Comcast-owned  broadcast network through 2017  a person with knowledge of the decision said on Friday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Senior Univision executive  Conde  moves to NBCUniversal
article: LOS ANGELES  Sept 13 Univision President Cesar Conde is leaving the Spanish-language media company to take a senior role at Comcast Corp -owned NBCUniversal.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast unit names TV exec Shell to run Universal film group
article: LOS ANGELES Comcast Corp elevated NBCUniversal TV executive Jeff Shell to chairman of the Universal Filmed Entertainment Group  replacing Ron Meyer who is moving into a more senior job at the media giant  the company said on Monday.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast's Fandango ticket service buys Quantum promotion firm
article: Aug 28 Fandango  the movie ticketing service owned by cable company  Comcast  said on Wednesday it was buying Quantum Loyalty Solutions  which creates promotions linked to ticket sales.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: NBC Universal's fortune reversal lifts Comcast results
article: Comcast Corp posted a higher quarterly profit on Wednesday  as it added more Internet customers than expected on the cable side and saw a more than 20 percent increase in operating cash flow at its NBC Universal unit. | Video

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: CORRECTED-'Real Housewives' New Jersey couple facing fraud charges
article: (In 10th paragraph  corrects NBC's ownership from GE to Comcast. Editor's note: Please be advised that first sentence contains language that may offend some readers)

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Media owners keep Hulu website  may bring in partners
article: LOS ANGELES Walt Disney Co  Twenty-First Century Fox Inc and Comcast Corp's NBCUniversal said on Friday they decided to keep their video streaming website  Hulu  and will invest $750 million to help it grow.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Universal lures 'Dark Knight' producer Tull from Warner Brothers
article: LOS ANGELES NBCUniversal  cable giant Comcast's Hollywood unit  has signed Thomas Tull  luring the producer behind big budget blockbusters such as "The Dark Knight" and "Man of Steel" away from Warner Brothers and beating out other studios including Sony and 20th Century Fox.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Comcast unveils new voice-activated cable TV guide
article: WASHINGTON Comcast Corp on Tuesday introduced at an industry conference a new  compact-sized cable TV box that allows viewers to use voice commands to search for TV shows  and lets users send web video to their television sets.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: U.S. appeals court sides with Comcast in Tennis Channel dispute
article: WASHINGTON A federal appeals court ruled on Tuesday that Comcast Corp. did not discriminate against the Tennis Channel by placing it in a different cable television subscription tier than its own sports networks.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: WRAPUP 2-Major media companies top estimates in shaky ad market
article: May 1 Some of the biggest U.S. media conglomerates beat earnings expectations on Wednesday  though Time Warner Inc  Viacom Inc and Comcast Corp all found their television businesses under scrutiny in a tough advertising market.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Supreme Court sends back lawsuit on washing machines
article: WASHINGTON The Supreme Court on Monday wiped out an appeals court ruling in favor of consumers who bought front-loading washing machines made by Whirlpool Corp .

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: UPDATE 3-U.S. Supreme Court rules for Comcast in class action
article: March 27 The U.S. Supreme Court on Wednesday ruled in favor of Comcast Corp in a case over how much it charged a group of cable TV subscribers  the latest blow against consumers hoping to pursue class action lawsuits.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: TEXT-Fitch rates NBCUniversal Enterprise debt  preferred stock issuance
article: Feb 28 - Fitch Ratings has assigned the following ratings to NBCUniversal Enterprise  Inc.'s (Enterprise) debt and preferred stock to be issued in connection with Comcast Corporation's (Comcast) redemption of General Electric Corporation's (GE) ownership interest in NBCUniversal:  --'BBB+' Issuer Default Rating; --'BBB+' rating assigned to Enterprise's five-year  $1.35 billion amended and restated revolving credit agreement; --'BBB+' rating assigned to the company's senior unsecured notes totali

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Court grills FCC  Tennis Channel in Comcast discrimination suit
article: WASHINGTON U.S. Court of Appeals judges on Monday hit hard against the Federal Communications Commission and Tennis Channel in a case alleging Comcast Corp discriminated against the sports network  even raising the possibility of rendering the entire case moot because it might have been filed too late.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Wall Street pauses after rally to five-year high
article: NEW YORK Stocks drifted in light volume on Wednesday  ending little changed  as investors remained cautious after the S&P 500 index briefly hit its highest intraday level since November 2007. | Video

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: GE to sell rest of NBC stake to Comcast for $16.7 billion
article: Comcast Corp on Tuesday said it would buy General Electric's remaining 49 percent equity stake in their NBCUniversal joint venture for about $16.7 billion  speeding up a deal that had not been expected until at least late 2014.

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: BRIEF-Nbc news president Steve Capus is leaving the company
article: Feb 1 COMCAST:  * Nbc news president steve capus is leaving the company

name: Comcast Corporation
headline: Forward Calendar - U.S. corporate bond new issues
article: Jan 8 The following are lists of upcoming high-grade and high-yield corporate bond offerings in the United States. headline: UPDATE 4-Sports fans can pursue US antitrust case over programs
article: * Subscribers claimed to overpay for TV  Internet packages
